h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ chakkanipātassa ^a^V3.0089^ea^ ^a^M3.0087^ea^ ^a^P3.0335^ea^ paṭhame ^b^idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhū^eb^ti, bhikkhave, imasmiṃ sāsane bhikkhu. ^b^neva sumano hoti na dummano^eb^ti iṭṭhārammaṇe rāgasahagatena somanassena sumano vā aniṭṭhārammaṇe dosasahagatena domanassena dummano vā na hoti. ^b^upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno^eb^ti majjhattārammaṇe asamapekkhanena aññāṇupekkhāya upekkhakabhāvaṃ anāpajjitvā sato ^a^V3.0090^ea^ sampajāno hutvā ārammaṇe majjhatto viharati. imasmiṃ sutte khīṇāsavassa satatavihāro kathito.

[03] 2-4^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^anekavihitaṃ iddhividha^eb^ntiādīni visuddhimagge vuttāneva. ^b^āsavānaṃ khayā anāsava^eb^nti āsavānaṃ khayena anāsavaṃ, na cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ viya abhāvenāti. imasmiṃ sutte khīṇāsavassa abhiññā paṭipāṭiyā kathitā. tatiyacatutthesu khīṇāsavo kathito.

[03] 5-7^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^aṅgehī^eb^ti guṇaṅgehi. ^b^khamo^eb^ti adhivāsako. ^b^rūpāna^eb^nti rūpārammaṇānaṃ. ^b^vaṇṇasampanno^eb^ti ^a^P3.0336^ea^ sarīravaṇṇena sampanno. chaṭṭhe ^b^balasampanno^eb^ti kāyabalena sampanno. sattame ^b^javasampanno^eb^ti padajavena sampanno.

[03] 8-9^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^anuttariyānī^eb^ti aññena uttaritarena rahitāni niruttarāni. ^b^dassanānuttariya^eb^nti rūpadassanesu anuttaraṃ. esa nayo sabbapadesu ^a^M3.0088^ea^. hatthiratanādīnañhi dassanaṃ na dassanānuttariyaṃ, niviṭṭhasaddhassa pana niviṭṭhapemavasena dasabalassa vā bhikkhusaṅghassa vā kasiṇāsubhanimittādīnaṃ vā aññatarassa dassanaṃ dassanānuttariyaṃ nāma. khattiyādīnaṃ guṇakathāsavanaṃ na savanānuttariyaṃ, niviṭṭhasaddhassa pana niviṭṭhapemavasena tiṇṇaṃ vā ratanānaṃ guṇakathāsavanaṃ tepiṭakabuddhavacanasavanaṃ vā savanānuttariyaṃ nāma. maṇiratanādīnaṃ lābho na lābhānuttariyaṃ, sattavidhāriyadhanalābho pana lābhānuttariyaṃ nāma. hatthisippādisikkhanaṃ na sikkhānuttariyaṃ, sikkhāttayassa pūraṇaṃ pana sikkhānuttariyaṃ nāma. khattiyādīnaṃ pāricariyā na pāricariyānuttariyaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ pana ratanānaṃ pāricariyā pāricariyānuttariyaṃ nāma. khattiyādīnaṃ guṇānussaraṇaṃ na anussatānuttariyaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ pana ratanānaṃ guṇānussaraṇaṃ anussatānuttariyaṃ ^a^V3.0091^ea^ nāma. iti imāni cha anuttariyāni lokiyalokuttarāni kathitāni. navame ^b^buddhānussatī^eb^ti buddhaguṇārammaṇā sati. sesapadesupi eseva nayo.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^mahānāmo^eb^ti dasabalassa cūḷapitu putto eko sakyarājā. ^b^yena^eb^ ^a^P3.0337^ea^ ^b^bhagavā tenupasaṅkamī^eb^ti bhuttapātarāso hutvā dāsaparijanaparivuto gandhamālādīni gāhāpetvā yattha satthā, tattha agamāsi. ariyaphalaṃ assa āgatanti ^b^āgataphalo^eb^. sikkhāttayasāsanaṃ etena viññātanti ^b^viññātasāsano^eb^. iti ayaṃ rājā ``sotāpannassa nissayavihāraṃ pucchāmī''ti pucchanto evamāha.

[03] ^b^nevassa rāgapariyuṭṭhita^eb^nti na uppajjamānena rāgena uṭṭhahitvā gahitaṃ. ^b^ujugata^eb^nti buddhānussatikammaṭṭhāne ujukameva gataṃ. ^b^tathāgataṃ ārabbhā^eb^ti tathāgataguṇe ārabbha. ^b^atthaveda^eb^nti aṭṭhakathaṃ nissāya uppannaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ. ^b^dhammaveda^eb^nti pāḷiṃ nissāya uppannaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ. ^b^dhammūpasañhita^eb^nti pāḷiñca aṭṭhakathañca nissāya uppannaṃ. ^b^pamuditassā^eb^ti duvidhena pāmojjena pamuditassa. ^b^pīti jāyatī^eb^ti pañcavidhā pīti nibbattati. ^b^kāyo passambhatī^eb^ti nāmakāyo ca karajakāyo ca darathapaṭippassaddhiyā paṭippassambhati. ^b^sukha^eb^nti kāyikacetasikasukhaṃ. ^b^samādhiyatī^eb^ti ārammaṇe sammā ṭhapitaṃ hoti. ^b^visamagatāya pajāyā^eb^ti rāgadosamohavisamagatesu sattesu. ^b^samappatto^eb^ti samaṃ upasamaṃ patto hutvā. ^b^sabyāpajjhāyā^eb^ti sadukkhāya. ^b^dhammasotaṃ^eb^ ^a^M3.0089^ea^ ^b^samāpanno^eb^ti vipassanāsaṅkhātaṃ dhammasotaṃ samāpanno. ^b^buddhānussatiṃ bhāvetī^eb^ti buddhānussatikammaṭṭhānaṃ brūheti vaḍḍheti. iminā nayena sabbattha attho veditabbo. iti ^a^P3.0338^ea^ mahānāmo sotāpannassa nissayavihāraṃ pucchi. satthāpissa tameva kathesi. evaṃ imasmiṃ sutte sotāpannova kathitoti.
[06] āhuneyyavaggo paṭhamo.

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ dutiyassa ^a^V3.0092^ea^ paṭhame ^b^sāraṇīyā^eb^ti saritabbayuttakā. ^b^mettaṃ kāyakamma^eb^nti mettena cittena kātabbaṃ kāyakammaṃ. ^b^vacīkammamanokammesu^eb^pi eseva nayo. imāni ca pana bhikkhūnaṃ vasena āgatāni, gihīsupi labbhanti. bhikkhūnañhi mettena cittena ābhisamācārikadhammapūraṇaṃ mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma. gihīnaṃ cetiyavandanatthāya bodhivandanatthāya saṅghanimantanatthāya gamanaṃ, gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhe bhikkhū disvā paccuggamanaṃ, pattapaṭiggahaṇaṃ, āsanapaññāpanaṃ, anugamananti evamādikaṃ mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma.

[03] bhikkhūnaṃ mettena cittena ācārapaṇṇattisikkhāpanaṃ, kammaṭṭhānakathanaṃ, dhammadesanā, tepiṭakampi buddhavacanaṃ mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma. gihīnaṃ ``cetiyavandanāya gacchāma, bodhivandanāya gacchāma, dhammassavanaṃ karissāma, dīpamālāpupphapūjaṃ karissāma, tīṇi sucaritāni samādāya vattissāma, salākabhattādīni dassāma, vassāvāsikaṃ dassāma, ajja saṅghassa cattāro paccaye dassāma, saṅghaṃ nimantetvā khādanīyādīni saṃvidahatha, āsanāni paññāpetha, pānīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpetha, saṅghaṃ paccuggantvā ^a^P3.0339^ea^ ānetha, paññattāsane nisīdāpetvā ussāhajātā veyyāvaccaṃ karothā''tiādivacanakāle mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma.

[03] bhikkhūnaṃ pātova uṭṭhāya sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ cetiyaṅgaṇavattādīni ca katvā vivittāsane nisīditvā ``imasmiṃ vihāre bhikkhū sukhī hontu averā abyāpajjhā''ti ^a^M3.0090^ea^ cintanaṃ mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāma. gihīnaṃ ``ayyā sukhī hontu averā abyāpajjhā''ti cintanaṃ mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāma.

[03] ^b^āvi ceva raho cā^eb^ti sammukhā ca parammukhā ca. tattha navakānaṃ cīvarakammādīsu sahāyabhāvagamanaṃ sammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma, therānaṃ pana pādadhovanadānādibhedaṃ sabbampi sāmīcikammaṃ sammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma. ubhayehipi dunnikkhittānaṃ dārubhaṇḍādīnaṃ tesu avaññaṃ ^a^V3.0093^ea^ akatvā attanā dunnikkhittānaṃ viya paṭisāmanaṃ parammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma. ``devatthero tissatthero''ti evaṃ paggayha vacanaṃ sammukhā mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma. vihāre asantaṃ pana paṭipucchantassa ``kahaṃ amhākaṃ devatthero, kahaṃ amhākaṃ tissatthero, kadā nu kho āgamissatī''ti evaṃ mamāyanavacanaṃ parammukhā mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma. mettāsinehasiniddhāni pana nayanāni ummīletvā pasannena mukhena olokanaṃ sammukhā mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāma. ``devatthero tissatthero arogo hotu appābādho''ti samannāharaṇaṃ parammukhā mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāma.

[03] ^b^lābhā^eb^ti cīvarādayo laddhapaccayā. ^b^dhammikā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0340^ea^ kuhanādibhedaṃ micchājīvaṃ vajjetvā dhammena samena bhikkhācariyavattena uppannā. ^b^antamaso pattapariyāpannamattampī^eb^ti pacchimakoṭiyā pattapariyāpannaṃ pattassa antogataṃ dvattikaṭacchubhikkhāmattampi. ^b^appaṭivibhattabhogī^eb^ti ettha dve paṭivibhattāni nāma āmisapaṭivibhattaṃ pana puggalapaṭivibhattañca. tattha ``ettakaṃ dassāmi, ettakaṃ na dassāmī''ti evaṃ cittena paṭivibhajanaṃ āmisapaṭivibhattaṃ nāma. ``asukassa dassāmi, asukassa na dassāmī''ti evaṃ cittena vibhajanaṃ pana puggalapaṭivibhattaṃ nāma. tadubhayampi akatvā yo appaṭivibhattaṃ bhuñjati, ayaṃ appaṭivibhattabhogī nāma. ^b^sīlavantehi sabrahmacārīhi sādhāraṇabhogī^eb^ti ettha sādhāraṇabhogino idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ -- yaṃ yaṃ paṇītaṃ labhati, taṃ taṃ neva lābhenalābhaṃ-nijigīsanatāmukhena gihīnaṃ deti, na attanā paribhuñjati, paṭiggaṇhanto ca ``saṅghena sādhāraṇaṃ hotū''ti gahetvā ghaṇṭiṃ paharitvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ saṅghasantakaṃ viya passati.

[03] imaṃ pana sāraṇīyadhammaṃ ko pūreti, ko na pūreti? dussīlo tāva na pūreti. na hi tassa santakaṃ sīlavantā gaṇhanti. parisuddhasīlo pana ^a^M3.0091^ea^ vattaṃ akhaṇḍento pūreti. tatridaṃ vattaṃ -- yo hi odissakaṃ katvā mātu vā pitu vā ācariyupajjhāyādīnaṃ vā deti, so dātabbaṃ deti. sāraṇīyadhammo panassa na hoti, palibodhajagganaṃ nāma hoti. sāraṇīyadhammo hi muttapalibodhassa vaṭṭati. tena pana odissakaṃ ^a^P3.0341^ea^ dentena gilānagilānupaṭṭhākāagantukagamikānañceva navapabbajitassa ca saṅghāṭipattaggahaṇaṃ ajānantassa dātabbaṃ. etesaṃ datvā avasesaṃ therāsanato paṭṭhāya thokaṃ thokaṃ adatvā yo yattakaṃ gaṇhāti, tassa tattakaṃ dātabbaṃ. avasiṭṭhe ^a^V3.0094^ea^ asati puna piṇḍāya caritvā therāsanato paṭṭhāya yaṃ yaṃ paṇītaṃ, taṃ taṃ datvā sesaṃ bhuñjitabbaṃ. ``sīlavantehī''ti vacanato dussīlassa adātumpi vaṭṭati.

[03] ayaṃ pana sāraṇīyadhammo susikkhitāya parisāya supūro hoti, susikkhitāya hi parisāya yo aññato labhati, so na gaṇhāti. aññato alabhantopi pamāṇayuttameva gaṇhati, na atirekaṃ. ayaṃ pana sāraṇīyadhammo evaṃ punappunaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā laddhaṃ laddhaṃ dentassāpi dvādasahi vassehi pūreti, na tato oraṃ. sace hi dvādasame vasse sāraṇīyadhammapūrako piṇḍapātapūraṃ pattaṃ āsanasālāyaṃ ṭhapetvā nhāyituṃ gacchati, saṅghatthero ca ``kasseso patto''ti vatvā ``sāraṇīyadhammapūrakassā''ti vutte ``āharatha na''nti sabbaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ vicāretvāva bhuñjitvā rittapattaṃ ṭhapeti. atha kho so bhikkhu rittapattaṃ disvā ``mayhaṃ asesetvāva paribhuñjiṃsū''ti domanassaṃ uppādeti, sāraṇīyadhammo bhijjati, puna dvādasa vassāni pūretabbo hoti. titthiyaparivāsasadiso hesa, sakiṃ khaṇḍe jāte puna pūretabbova. yo pana ``lābhā vata me, suladdhaṃ vata me, yassa me pattagataṃ anāpucchāva sabrahmacārī paribhuñjantī''ti somanassaṃ janeti, tassa puṇṇo nāma hoti.

[03] evaṃ pūritasāraṇīyadhammassa pana neva issā na macchariyaṃ hoti, manussānaṃ piyo hoti, amanussānaṃ ^a^P3.0342^ea^ piyo hoti, sulabhapaccayo. pattagatamassa diyyamānampi na khīyati, bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṭṭhāne aggabhaṇḍaṃ labhati, bhaye vā chātake vā patte devatā ussukkaṃ āpajjanti.

[03] tatrimāni ^a^M3.0092^ea^ vatthūni -- ^b^senagirivāsī tissatthero^eb^ kira mahāgirigāmaṃ upanissāya vasati, paññāsa mahātherā nāgadīpaṃ cetiyavandanatthāya gacchantā girigāme piṇḍāya caritvā kiñci aladdhā nikkhamiṃsu. thero pavisanto te disvā pucchi -- ``laddhaṃ, bhante''ti? vicarimhā, āvusoti. so aladdhabhāvaṃ ñatvā āha -- ``bhante, yāvāhaṃ āgacchāmi, tāva idheva hothā''ti. mayaṃ, āvuso, paññāsa janā pattatemanamattampi na labhimhāti. bhante, nevāsikā nāma paṭibalā honti, alabhantāpi bhikkhācāramaggasabhāgaṃ jānantīti. therā āgamesuṃ. thero gāmaṃ pāvisi. dhurageheyeva mahāupāsikā khīrabhattaṃ sajjetvā theraṃ olokayamānā ṭhitā therassa dvāraṃ sampattasseva pattaṃ pūretvā adāsi. so taṃ ādāya therānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā ``gaṇhatha ^a^V3.0095^ea^, bhante''ti saṅghattheraṃ āha. thero ``amhehi ettakehi kiñci na laddhaṃ, ayaṃ sīghameva gahetvā āgato, kiṃ nu kho''ti sesānaṃ mukhaṃ olokesi. thero olokanākāreneva ñatvā, ``bhante, dhammena samena laddho, nikkukkuccā gaṇhathā''ti ādito paṭṭhāya sabbesaṃ yāvadatthaṃ datvā attanāpi yāvadatthaṃ bhuñji.

[03] atha naṃ bhattakiccāvasāne therā pucchiṃsu -- ``kadā, āvuso, lokuttaradhammaṃ paṭivijjhī''ti? natthi me, bhante, lokuttaradhammoti. jhānalābhīsi, āvusoti. etampi, bhante, natthīti? nanu, āvuso, pāṭihāriyanti. sāraṇīyadhammo me, bhante, pūrito, tassa ^a^P3.0343^ea^ me pūritakālato paṭṭhāya sacepi bhikkhusatasahassaṃ hoti, pattagataṃ na khīyatīti. sādhu sādhu, sappurisa, anucchavikamidaṃ tuyhanti. idaṃ tāva ^b^pattagataṃ na khīyatī^eb^ti ettha vatthu.

[03] ayameva pana thero cetiyapabbate giribhaṇḍamahāpūjāya dānaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā ``imasmiṃ dāne kiṃ varabhaṇḍa''nti pucchi. dve sāṭakā, bhanteti. ete mayhaṃ pāpuṇissantīti? taṃ sutvā amacco rañño ārocesi -- ``eko daharo evaṃ vadatī''ti. ``daharassa evaṃ cittaṃ, mahātherānaṃ pana sukhumasāṭakā ^a^M3.0093^ea^ vaṭṭantī''ti vatvā ``mahātherānaṃ dassāmī''ti ṭhapesi. tassa bhikkhusaṅghe paṭipāṭiyā ṭhite dentassa matthake ṭhapitāpi te sāṭakā hatthaṃ nārohanti, aññeva ārohanti. daharassa dānakāle pana hatthaṃ āruḷhā. so tassa hatthe ṭhapetvā amaccassa mukhaṃ oloketvā daharaṃ nisīdāpetvā dānaṃ datvā saṅghaṃ vissajjetvā daharassa santike nisīditvā ``kadā, bhante, imaṃ dhammaṃ paṭivijjhitthā''ti āha. so pariyāyenapi asantaṃ avadanto ``natthi mayhaṃ, mahārāja, lokuttaradhammo''ti āha. nanu, bhante, pubbeva avacutthāti. āma, mahārāja, sāraṇīyadhammapūrako ahaṃ, tassa me dhammassa pūritakālato paṭṭhāya bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṭṭhāne aggabhaṇḍaṃ pāpuṇātīti. ``sādhu sādhu, bhante, anucchavikamidaṃ tumhāka''nti vatvā pakkāmi. idaṃ ^b^bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṭṭhāne aggabhaṇḍaṃ pāpuṇātī^eb^ti ettha vatthu.

[03] brāhmaṇatissabhaye pana bhātaragāmavāsino nāgattheriyā anārocetvāva palāyiṃsu. therī paccūsasamaye ``ativiya ^a^P3.0344^ea^ appanigghoso gāmo, upadhāretha tāvā''ti daharabhikkhuniyo āha. tā gantvā sabbesaṃ gatabhāvaṃ ñatvā āgamma theriyā ārocesuṃ. sā sutvā ``mā tumhe tesaṃ gatabhāvaṃ cintayittha, attano uddesaparipucchāyonisomanasikāresuyeva yogaṃ karothā''ti vatvā bhikkhācāravelāyaṃ ^a^V3.0096^ea^ pārupitvā attadvādasamā gāmadvāre nigrodharukkhamūle aṭṭhāsi. rukkhe adhivatthā devatā dvādasannampi bhikkhunīnaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ datvā, ``ayye, aññattha mā gacchatha, niccaṃ idheva āgaccheyyāthā''ti āha. theriyā pana kaniṭṭhabhātā nāgatthero nāma atthi. so ``mahantaṃ bhayaṃ, na sakkā yāpetuṃ, paratīraṃ gamissāmī''ti attadvādasamova attano vasanaṭṭhānā nikkhanto ``theriṃ disvā gamissāmī''ti bhātaragāmaṃ āgato. therī ``therā āgatā''ti sutvā tesaṃ santikaṃ gantvā ``kiṃ ayyā''ti pucchi. so taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. sā ``ajja ekadivasaṃ vihāreva vasitvā sve gamissathā''ti āha. therā vihāraṃ agamiṃsu.

[03] therī punadivase rukkhamūle piṇḍāya caritvā theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā ``imaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjathā''ti āha. thero ``vaṭṭissati therī''ti vatvā tuṇhī aṭṭhāsi. dhammiko, tāta, piṇḍapāto, kukkuccaṃ akatvā paribhuñjathāti ^a^M3.0094^ea^. vaṭṭissati therīti? sā pattaṃ gahetvā ākāse khipi, patto ākāse aṭṭhāsi. thero ``sattatālamatte ṭhitampi bhikkhunībhattameva therī''ti vatvā ``bhayaṃ nāma sabbakālaṃ na hoti, bhaye vūpasante ariyavaṃsaṃ kathayamāno, `bho piṇḍapātika, bhikkhunībhattaṃ bhuñjitvā vītināmayitthā'ti cittena anuvadiyamāno santhambhituṃ na sakkhissāmi, appamattā hotha ^a^P3.0345^ea^ theriyo''ti maggaṃ paṭipajji.

[03] rukkhadevatāpi ``sace thero theriyā hatthato piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjissati, na taṃ nivattessāmi. sace na paribhuñjissati, nivattessāmī''ti cintayamānā ṭhatvā therassa gamanaṃ disvā rukkhā oruyha ``pattaṃ, bhante, dethā''ti vatvā pattaṃ gahetvā theraṃ rukkhamūlaṃyeva ānetvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā piṇḍapātaṃ datvā katabhattakiccaṃ paṭiññaṃ kāretvā dvādasa bhikkhuniyo dvādasa ca bhikkhū satta vassāni upaṭṭhahi. idaṃ ^b^devatā ussukkaṃ āpajjantī^eb^ti ettha vatthu. tatra hi therī sāraṇīyadhammapūrikā ahosi.

[03] ^b^akhaṇḍānī^eb^tiādīsu yassa sattasu āpattikkhandhesu ādimhi vā ante vā sikkhāpadaṃ bhinnaṃ hoti, tassa sīlaṃ pariyante chinnasāṭako viya ^b^khaṇḍaṃ^eb^ nāma. yassa pana vemajjhe bhinnaṃ, tassa chiddasāṭako viya ^b^chiddaṃ^eb^ nāma hoti. yassa paṭipāṭiyā dve tīṇi bhinnāni, tassa piṭṭhiyaṃ vā kucchiyaṃ vā uṭṭhitena visabhāgavaṇṇena kāḷarattādīnaṃ aññataravaṇṇā gāvī viya ^b^sabalaṃ^eb^ ^a^V3.0097^ea^ nāma hoti. yassa antarantarā bhinnāni, tassa antarantarā visabhāgabinduvicitrā gāvī viya ^b^kammāsaṃ^eb^ nāma hoti. yassa pana sabbena sabbaṃ abhinnāni, tassa tāni sīlāni ^b^akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni^eb^ nāma honti. tāni panetāni taṇhādāsabyato mocetvā bhujissabhāvakaraṇato ^b^bhujissāni,^eb^ buddhādīhi viññūhi pasatthattā ^b^viññuppasatthāni,^eb^ taṇhādiṭṭhīhi aparāmaṭṭhattā ``idaṃ nāma tvaṃ āpannapubbo''ti kenaci parāmaṭṭhuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā ca ^b^aparāmaṭṭhāni,^eb^ upacārasamādhiṃ appanāsamādhiṃ vā saṃvattayantīti ^b^samādhisaṃvattanikānī^eb^ti vuccanti.

[03] ^b^sīlasāmaññagato^eb^ ^a^M3.0095^ea^ ^a^P3.0346^ea^ ^b^viharatī^eb^ti tesu tesu disābhāgesu viharantehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ samānabhāvūpagatasīlo viharati. sotāpannādīnañhi sīlaṃ samuddantarepi devalokepi vasantānaṃ aññesaṃ sotāpannādīnaṃ sīlena samānameva hoti, natthi maggasīle nānattaṃ. taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^yāyaṃ diṭṭhī^eb^ti maggasampayuttā sammādiṭṭhi. ^b^ariyā^eb^ti niddosā. niyyātīti ^b^niyyānikā. takkarassā^eb^ti yo tathākārī hoti. ^b^dukkhakkhayāyā^eb^ti sabbadukkhakkhayatthaṃ. ^b^diṭṭhisāmaññagato^eb^ti samānadiṭṭhibhāvaṃ upagato hutvā viharatīti.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ dutiye yo te dhamme pūreti, taṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyaṃ karontīti ^b^piyakaraṇā^eb^. garuṃ karontīti ^b^garukaraṇā. saṅgahāyā^eb^ti saṅgaṇhanatthāya. ^b^avivādāyā^eb^ti avivadanatthāya. ^b^sāmaggiyā^eb^ti samaggabhāvatthāya. ^b^ekībhāvāyā^eb^ti ekabhāvatthāya ninnānākaraṇāya. ^b^saṃvattantī^eb^ti vattanti pavattanti.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^nissāraṇīyā dhātuyo^eb^ti nissaraṇadhātuyova. ^b^mettā hi kho me cetovimuttī^eb^ti ettha paccanīkadhammehi vimuttattā tikacatukkajjhānikā mettāva mettācetovimutti nāma ^a^V3.0098^ea^. ^b^bhāvitā^eb^ti vaḍḍhitā. ^b^bahulīkatā^eb^ti punappunaṃ katā. ^b^yānīkatā^eb^ti yuttayānasadisā katā. ^b^vatthukatā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0347^ea^ patiṭṭhā katā. ^b^anuṭṭhitā^eb^ti adhiṭṭhitā. ^b^paricitā^eb^ti samantato citā ācitā upacitā. ^b^susamāraddhā^eb^ti suppaguṇakaraṇena suṭṭhu samāraddhā. ^b^pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti pariyādiyitvā gahetvā tiṭṭhati. ^b^mā hevantissa vacanīyo^eb^ti yasmā abhūtabyākaraṇaṃ byākaroti, tasmā ``mā evaṃ bhaṇī''ti vattabbo. ^b^yadidaṃ mettācetovimuttī^eb^ti yā ayaṃ mettācetovimutti, idaṃ nissaraṇaṃ byāpādassa, byāpādato nissaṭāti attho. yo pana mettāya tikacatukkajjhānato vuṭṭhito saṅkhāre sammasitvā tatiyamaggaṃ patvā ``puna ^a^M3.0096^ea^ byāpādo natthī''ti tatiyaphalena nibbānaṃ passati, tassa cittaṃ accantanissaraṇaṃ byāpādassa. etenupāyena sabbattha attho veditabbo.

[03] ^b^animittācetovimuttī^eb^ti balavavipassanā. dīghabhāṇakā pana arahattaphalasamāpattīti vadanti. sā hi rāganimittādīnañceva rūpanimittādīnañca niccanimittādīnañca abhāvā animittāti vuttā. ^b^nimittānusārī^eb^ti vuttappabhedaṃ nimittaṃ anusaraṇasabhāvaṃ.

[03] ^b^asmī^eb^ti asmimāno. ^b^ayamahamasmī^eb^ti pañcasu khandhesu ayaṃ nāma ahaṃ asmīti. ettāvatā arahattaṃ byākataṃ hoti. ^b^vicikicchākathaṃkathāsalla^eb^nti vicikicchābhūtaṃ kathaṃkathāsallaṃ. ^b^mā hevantissa vacanīyo^eb^ti sace te paṭhamamaggavajjhā vicikicchā uppajjati, arahattabyākaraṇaṃ micchā hoti, tasmā ``mā abhūtaṃ gaṇhī''ti vāretabbo. ^b^asmīti^eb^ ^a^P3.0348^ea^ ^b^mānasamugghāto^eb^ti arahattamaggo. arahattamaggaphalavasena hi nibbāne diṭṭhe puna asmimāno natthīti arahattamaggo ``asmīti mānasamugghāto''ti vutto. iti imasmiṃ sutte abhūtabyākaraṇaṃ nāma kathitaṃ.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^na bhaddaka^eb^nti na laddhakaṃ. tattha yo hi bhītabhīto marati, tassa na bhaddakaṃ maraṇaṃ hoti. yo apāye paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhāti, tassa na bhaddikā kālakiriyā hoti. ^b^kammārāmo^eb^tiādīsu āramaṇaṃ ārāmo, abhiratīti attho. vihārakaraṇādimhi navakamme ārāmo assāti ^b^kammārāmo^eb^. tasmiṃyeva kamme ratoti ^b^kammarato^eb^. tadeva kammārāmataṃ punappunaṃ yuttoti ^a^V3.0099^ea^ ^b^anuyutto^eb^. esa nayo sabbattha. ettha ca ^b^bhassa^eb^nti ālāpasallāpo. ^b^niddā^eb^ti soppaṃ. ^b^saṅgaṇikā^eb^ti gaṇasaṅgaṇikā. sā ``ekassa dutiyo hoti, dvinnaṃ hoti tatiyako''tiādinā nayena veditabbā. ^b^saṃsaggo^eb^ti dassanasavanasamullāpasambhogakāyasaṃsaggavasena pavatto saṃsaṭṭhabhāvo. ^b^papañco^eb^ti taṇhādiṭṭhimānavasena pavatto madanākārasaṇṭhito kilesapapañco. ^b^sakkāya^eb^nti tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ. ^b^sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā^eb^ti hetunā nayena sakalavaṭṭadukkhassa parivaṭumaparicchedakaraṇatthaṃ. ^b^mago^eb^ti magasadiso. ^b^nippapañcapade^eb^ti nibbānapade. ^b^ārādhayī^eb^ti paripūrayi taṃ sampādesīti.
[03] 15^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^a^M3.0097^ea^ ^a^P3.0349^ea^ ^b^anutappā^eb^ti anusocitabbā anutāpakārī. imesu dvīsupi suttesu gāthāsu ca vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^bāḷhagilāno^eb^ti adhimattagilāno. ^b^etadavocā^eb^ti sāmikassa bhesajjaṃ katvā byādhiṃ vūpasametuṃ asakkontī idāni sīhanādaṃ naditvā saccakiriyāya byādhiṃ vūpasametuṃ santike nisīditvā etaṃ ``mā kho tva''ntiādivacanaṃ avoca. ^b^sāpekkho^eb^ti sataṇho. ^b^na nakulamātā^eb^ti ettha na-kāro na sakkhatīti evaṃ parapadena yojetabbo. ^b^santharitu^eb^nti nicchiddaṃ kātuṃ, saṇṭhapetunti attho. ^b^veṇiṃ olikhitu^eb^nti eḷakalomāni kappetvā vijaṭetvā veṇiṃ kātuṃ.

[03] ^b^aññaṃ gharaṃ gamissatī^eb^ti aññaṃ sāmikaṃ gaṇhissati. ^b^soḷasa vassāni gahaṭṭhakaṃ brahmacariyaṃ samāciṇṇa^eb^nti ito soḷasavassamatthake gahaṭṭhabrahmacariyavāso samāciṇṇo. ^b^dassanakāmatarā^eb^ti atirekena dassanakāmā. imehi tīhi aṅgehi sīhanādaṃ naditvā ``iminā saccena tava sarīre byādhi phāsu hotū''ti saccakiriyaṃ akāsi.

[03] idāni bhagavantaṃ sakkhiṃ katvā attano sīlādiguṇehipi saccakiriyaṃ kātuṃ ^b^siyā kho^eb^ ^a^V3.0100^ea^ ^b^pana te^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^paripūrakārinī^eb^ti samattakārinī. ^b^cetosamathassā^eb^ti samādhikammaṭṭhānassa. ^b^ogādhappattā^eb^ti ogādhaṃ anuppavesaṃ pattā. ^b^patigādhappattā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0350^ea^ patigādhaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ pattā. ^b^assāsappattā^eb^ti assāsaṃ avassayaṃ pattā. ^b^vesārajjappattā^eb^ti somanassañāṇaṃ pattā. ^b^aparappaccayā^eb^ti parappaccayo vuccati parasaddhā parapattiyāyanā, tāya virahitāti attho. imehi tīhi aṅgehi attano guṇe ārabbha saccakiriyaṃ akāsi. ^b^gilānā vuṭṭhito^eb^ti gilāno hutvā vuṭṭhito. ^b^yāvatā^eb^ti yattikāyo. ^b^tāsaṃ aññatarā^eb^ti tāsaṃ antare ekā. ^b^anukampikā^eb^ti hitānukampikā. ^b^ovādikā^eb^ti ovādadāyikā. ^b^anusāsikā^eb^ti anusiṭṭhidāyikā.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^M3.0098^ea^ ^b^paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito^eb^ti ekībhāvāya dhammanijjhānakkhantito phalasamāpattivihārato vuṭṭhito. ^b^yathāvihāra^eb^nti attano attano vasanavihāraṃ. ^b^navā^eb^ti pabbajjāya navakā. te pañcasatamattā ahesuṃ. ^b^kākacchamānā^eb^ti kākasaddaṃ karontā dante khādantā. ^b^therā^eb^ti thirabhāvaṃ pattā. ^b^tena no^eb^ti tena nu. ^b^seyyasukhā^eb^dīni heṭṭhā vuttatthāneva. ^b^raṭṭhiko^eb^ti yo raṭṭhaṃ bhuñjati. ^b^pettaṇiko^eb^ti yo pitarā bhuttānubhuttaṃ bhuñjati. ^b^senāpatiko^eb^ti senāya jeṭṭhako. ^b^gāmagāmaṇiko^eb^ti gāmabhojako. ^b^pūgagāmaṇiko^eb^ti gaṇajeṭṭhako. ^b^avipassako^eb^ ^a^P3.0351^ea^ ^b^kusalānaṃ dhammāna^eb^nti kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anesako agavesako hutvā. ^b^bodhipakkhiyānaṃ dhammāna^eb^nti sattatiṃsāya bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ.

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^macchika^eb^nti macchaghātakaṃ. hatthinā yātīti ^b^hatthiyāyī^eb^. paratopi eseva nayo. ^b^vajjhe^eb^ti vadhitabbe. ^b^vadhāyanīte^eb^ti vadhāya upanīte. ^b^pāpakena manasā^eb^ti lāmakena vadhakacittena. pāḷiyaṃ pana vadhāyupanīteti likhanti. ^b^māgaviko^eb^ti migaghātako. ^b^ko pana vādo manussabhūta^eb^nti yo manussabhūtaṃ pāpakena manasā anupekkhati, tassa sampattiyā abhāve kimeva vattabbaṃ. idaṃ pāpakassa kammuno aniṭṭhaphalabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. yesaṃ pana tādisaṃ kammaṃ karontānampi yasapaṭilābho hoti, tesaṃ taṃ akusalaṃ nissāya kusalaṃ vipaccatīti veditabbaṃ ^a^V3.0101^ea^. tena panassa akusalakammena upahatattā vipāko na ciraṭṭhitiko hoti. imasmiṃ sutte akusalapakkhova kathito.

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^nātike^eb^ti evaṃnāmake gāme. ^b^giñjakāvasathe^eb^ti iṭṭhakāmaye pāsāde. ^b^amatogadhā^eb^ti nibbānogadhā, nibbānapatiṭṭhāti attho. ^b^bhāvetha no^eb^ti bhāvetha nu. ^b^maraṇassati^eb^nti maraṇassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^aho vatā^eb^ti patthanatthe nipāto. ^b^bahuṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0352^ea^ ^b^vata me kataṃ assā^eb^ti ^a^M3.0099^ea^ tumhākaṃ sāsane mama kiccaṃ bahu kataṃ assa. ^b^tadantara^eb^nti taṃ antaraṃ khaṇaṃ okāsaṃ. ^b^assasitvā vā passasāmī^eb^ti ettha assāso vuccati anto pavisanavāto, passāso bahi nikkhamanavāto. iti ayaṃ bhikkhu yāva anto paviṭṭhavāto bahi nikkhamati, bahi nikkhanto vāto anto pavisati, tāva jīvitaṃ patthento evamāha. ^b^dandha^eb^nti mandaṃ garukaṃ asīghappavattaṃ. ^b^āsavānaṃ khayāyā^eb^ti arahattaphalatthāya. imasmiṃ sutte maraṇassati arahattaṃ pāpetvā kathitāti.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^patigatāyā^eb^ti paṭipannāya. ^b^iti paṭisañcikkhatī^eb^ti evaṃ paccavekkhati. ^b^so mamassa antarāyo^eb^ti ettha tividho antarāyo jīvitantarāyo, samaṇadhammantarāyo, puthujjanakālakiriyaṃ karontassa saggantarāyo ceva maggantarāyo cāti. taṃ sabbampi sandhāyevamāha. ^b^byāpajjeyyā^eb^ti ajiṇṇakādivasena vipajjeyya. ^b^adhimatto^eb^ti balavā. ^b^chando^eb^ti kattukamyatāchando. ^b^vāyāmo^eb^ti payogavīriyaṃ. ^b^ussāho^eb^ti ussāpanavīriyaṃ. ^b^ussoḷhī^eb^ti sampādanavīriyaṃ. ^b^appaṭivānī^eb^ti anukkaṇṭhanā appaṭisaṅgharaṇā. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
[06] sāraṇīyavaggo dutiyo.

[03] 21-22^b^.^eb^ tatiyassa ^a^V3.0102^ea^ ^a^P3.0353^ea^ paṭhame ^b^sāmagāmake^eb^ti sāmakānaṃ ussannattā evaṃladdhanāme gāmake. ^b^pokkharaṇiyāya^eb^nti pokkharaṇiyānāmake vihāre. ^b^abhikkantāya rattiyā^eb^ti rattiyā paṭhamayāmaṃ atikkamma majjhimayāme sampatte. ^b^abhikkantavaṇṇā^eb^ti abhikkantātimanāpavaṇṇā. ^b^kevalakappa^eb^nti sakalakappaṃ. ^b^pokkharaṇiyaṃ obhāsetvā^eb^ti pokkharaṇiyānāmakaṃ mahāvihāraṃ attano obhāsena pharitvā. ^b^samanuñño^eb^ti samānānuñño samānacitto. ^b^dovacassatā^eb^ti dubbacabhāvo. ^b^pāpamittatā^eb^ti lāmakamittatā ^a^M3.0100^ea^. imasmiṃ sutte parihāniyadhammāva kathitā. dutiye aparihāniyadhammā lokuttaramissakā kathitā.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^kāmarāgarattāya^eb^nti kāmarāgaratto ayaṃ. ^b^chandarāgavinibaddho^eb^ti chandarāgena vinibaddho. ^b^bhayā^eb^ti cittutrāsabhayā. ^b^paṅkā^eb^ti kilesapaṅkato. ^b^saṅgo paṅko ca ubhaya^eb^nti saṅgo ca paṅko ca idampi ubhayaṃ. ^b^ete kāmā pavuccanti, yattha satto puthujjano^eb^ti yasmiṃ saṅge ca paṅke ca puthujjano satto laggo laggito palibuddho. ^b^upādāne^eb^ti catubbidhe upādāne. ^b^jātimaraṇasambhave^eb^ti jātiyā ca maraṇassa ca sambhave paccayabhūte. ^b^anupādā^eb^ ^a^P3.0354^ea^ ^b^vimuccantī^eb^ti anupādiyitvā vimuccanti. ^b^jātimaraṇasaṅkhaye^eb^ti jātimaraṇānaṃ saṅkhayasaṅkhāte nibbāne, nibbānārammaṇāya vimuttiyā vimuccantīti attho. imasmiṃ ṭhāne vivaṭṭetvā arahattameva patto esa bhikkhu. idāni taṃ khīṇāsavaṃ thomento ^b^te khemappattā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^khemappattā^eb^ti khemabhāvaṃ pattā. ^b^sukhino^eb^ti lokuttarasukhena sukhitā. ^b^diṭṭhadhammābhinibbutā^eb^ti abbhantare kilesābhāvena diṭṭhadhammeyeva abhinibbutā. imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭameva kathetvā gāthāsu vaṭṭavivaṭaṃ kathitaṃ.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^V3.0103^ea^ ^b^padāleyyā^eb^ti bhindeyya. ^b^chavāyā^eb^ti lāmikāya. ^b^samādhissa samāpattikusalo hotī^eb^ti āhārasappāyautusappāyāni pariggahetvā samādhiṃ samāpajjituṃ kusalo hoti cheko samattho paṭibalo. ^b^samādhissa ṭhitikusalo^eb^ti samādhissa ṭhitiyaṃ kusalo, samādhiṃ ṭhapetuṃ sakkotīti attho. ^b^samādhissa vuṭṭhānakusalo^eb^ti samādhissa vuṭṭhāne kusalo, yathāparicchedena vuṭṭhātuṃ sakkotīti attho. ^b^samādhissa kallitakusalo^eb^ti samādhissa kallatāya kusalo, samādhicittaṃ hāsetuṃ kallaṃ kātuṃ sakkotīti attho. ^b^samādhissa gocarakusalo^eb^ti samādhissa asappāye anupakārake dhamme vajjetvā sappāye upakārake sevantopi, ``ayaṃ samādhinimittārammaṇo ^a^M3.0101^ea^ ayaṃ lakkhaṇārammaṇo''ti jānantopi samādhissa gocarakusalo nāma hoti. ^b^samādhissa abhinīhārakusalo^eb^ti upariuparisamāpattisamāpajjanatthāya ^a^P3.0355^ea^ paṭhamajjhānādisamādhiṃ abhinīharituṃ sakkonto samādhissa abhinīhārakusalo nāma hoti. so paṭhamajjhānā vuṭṭhāya dutiyaṃ samāpajjati, dutiyajjhānā...pe0... tatiyajjhānā vuṭṭhāya catutthaṃ samāpajjatīti.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^anussatiṭṭhānānī^eb^ti anussatikāraṇāni. ^b^itipi so bhagavā^eb^tiādīni visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 1.123 ādayo) vitthāritāneva. ^b^idampi kho, bhikkhave, ārammaṇaṃ karitvā^eb^ti idaṃ buddhānussatikammaṭṭhānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karitvā. ^b^visujjhantī^eb^ti paramavisuddhiṃ nibbānaṃ pāpuṇanti. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthameva. imasmiṃ pana sutte cha anussatiṭṭhānāni missakāni kathitānīti veditabbāni.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^sambādhe^eb^ti pañcakāmaguṇasambādhe. ^b^okāsādhigamo^eb^ti ettha okāsā vuccanti cha anussatiṭṭhānāni, tesaṃ adhigamo. ^b^visuddhiyā^eb^ti visujjhanatthāya. ^b^sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāyā^eb^ti sokānañca paridevānañca samatikkamatthāya. ^b^atthaṅgamāyā^eb^ti atthaṃ gamanatthāya ^a^V3.0104^ea^. ^b^ñāyassa adhigamāyā^eb^ti sahavipassanakassa maggassa adhigamanatthāya. ^b^nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyā^eb^ti apaccayaparinibbānassa paccakkhakiriyatthāya.

[03] ^b^sabbaso^eb^ti sabbākārena. ^b^ākāsasamenā^eb^ti alagganaṭṭhena ceva apalibuddhaṭṭhena ca ākāsasadisena. ^b^vipulenā^eb^ti na parittakena. ^b^mahaggatenā^eb^ti mahantabhāvaṃ gatena, mahantehi vā ariyasāvakehi gatena, paṭipannenāti attho. ^b^appamāṇenā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0356^ea^ pharaṇāppamāṇatāya appamāṇena. ^b^averenā^eb^ti akusalaverapuggalaverarahitena. ^b^abyāpajjhenā^eb^ti kodhadukkhavajjitena. sabbametaṃ buddhānussaticittameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. paratopi eseva nayo. ^b^visuddhidhammā^eb^ti visujjhanasabhāvā. imasmimpi sutte cha anussatiṭṭhānāni missakāneva kathitānīti.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^M3.0102^ea^ ^b^manobhāvanīyassā^eb^ti ettha manaṃ bhāveti vaḍḍhetīti manobhāvanīyo. ^b^dassanāyā^eb^ti dassanatthaṃ. ^b^nissaraṇa^eb^nti niggamanaṃ vūpasamanaṃ. ^b^dhammaṃ desetī^eb^ti kāmarāgappajahanatthāya asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ katheti. dutiyavārādīsu byāpādappahānāya mettākammaṭṭhānaṃ, thinamiddhappahānāya thinamiddhavinodanakammaṭṭhānaṃ, ālokasaññaṃ vā vīriyārambhavatthuādīnaṃ vā aññataraṃ, uddhaccakukkuccappahānāya samathakammaṭṭhānaṃ, vicikicchāpahānāya tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ guṇakathaṃ kathento dhammaṃ desetīti veditabbo. ^b^āgammā^eb^ti ārabbha. ^b^manasikaroto^eb^ti ārammaṇavasena citte karontassa. ^b^anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hotī^eb^ti anantarāyena āsavānaṃ khayo hoti.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^maṇḍalamāḷe^eb^ti bhojanasālāya. ^b^cārittakilamatho^eb^ti piṇḍapātacariyāya uppannakilamatho. ^b^bhattakilamatho^eb^ti bhattadaratho. ^b^vihārapacchāyāya^eb^nti vihārapaccante chāyāya. ^b^yadevassa^eb^ ^a^P3.0357^ea^ ^b^divā samādhinimittaṃ manasikataṃ hotī^eb^ti yaṃ eva tassa tato purimadivasabhāge samathanimittaṃ citte kataṃ hoti. ^b^tadevassa tasmiṃ samaye samudācaratī^eb^ti taṃyeva etassa tasmiṃ samaye divāvihāre nisinnassa manodvāre sañcarati. ^b^ojaṭṭhāyī^eb^ti ojāya ṭhito patiṭṭhito. ^b^phāsukassa^eb^ ^a^V3.0105^ea^ ^b^hotī^eb^ti phāsukaṃ assa hoti. ^b^sammukhā^eb^ti kathentassa sammukhaṭṭhāne. ^b^suta^eb^nti sotena sutaṃ. ^b^paṭiggahita^eb^nti cittena paṭiggahitaṃ.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^udāyi^eb^nti lāḷudāyittheraṃ. ^b^suṇomahaṃ, āvuso^eb^ti, āvuso, nāhaṃ badhiro, suṇāmi bhagavato vacanaṃ, pañhaṃ pana upaparikkhāmīti. ^b^adhicitta^eb^nti samādhivipassanācittaṃ. ^b^idaṃ, bhante, anussatiṭṭhāna^eb^nti idaṃ jhānattayasaṅkhātaṃ anussatikāraṇaṃ. ^b^diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāya saṃvattatī^eb^ti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve sukhavihāratthāya pavattati. ^b^ālokasañña^eb^nti ālokanimitte uppannasaññaṃ. ^b^divā saññaṃ adhiṭṭhātī^eb^ti divāti saññaṃ ṭhapeti ^a^M3.0103^ea^. ^b^yathā divā tathā ratti^eb^nti yathānena divā ālokasaññā manasikatā, rattimpi tatheva taṃ manasi karoti. ^b^yathā rattiṃ tathā divā^eb^ti yathā vānena rattiṃ ālokasaññā manasikatā, divāpi taṃ tatheva manasi karoti. ^b^vivaṭenā^eb^ti pākaṭena. ^b^apariyonaddhenā^eb^ti nīvaraṇehi anonaddhena. ^b^sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāvetī^eb^ti dibbacakkhuñāṇatthāya sahobhāsakaṃ cittaṃ brūheti vaḍḍheti. yaṃ pana ``ālokasaññaṃ ^a^P3.0358^ea^ manasi karotī''ti vuttaṃ, taṃ thinamiddhavinodanālokasaññaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na dibbacakkhuñāṇālokanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^ñāṇadassanappaṭilābhāyā^eb^ti dibbacakkhusaṅkhātassa ñāṇadassanassa paṭilābhāya.

[03] ^b^imameva kāya^eb^ntiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ sabbākārena vitthārato visuddhimagge kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhāne vuttaṃ. ^b^kāmarāgappahānāyā^eb^ti pañcakāmaguṇikassa rāgassa pahānatthāya. ^b^seyyathāpi passeyyā^eb^ti yathā passeyya. ^b^sarīra^eb^nti matasarīraṃ. ^b^sivathikāya chaḍḍita^eb^nti susāne apaviddhaṃ. ekāhaṃ matassa assāti ^b^ekāhamataṃ^eb^. dvīhaṃ matassa assāti ^b^dvīhamataṃ^eb^. tīhaṃ matassa assāti ^b^tīhamataṃ^eb^. bhastā viya vāyunā uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā yathānukkamaṃ samuggatena sūnabhāvena dhumātattā uddhumātaṃ, uddhumātameva ^b^uddhumātakaṃ^eb^. paṭikūlattā vā kucchitaṃ uddhumātanti ^b^uddhumātakaṃ^eb^. vinīlaṃ vuccati viparibhinnavaṇṇaṃ, vinīlameva ^b^vinīlakaṃ^eb^. paṭikūlattā vā kucchitaṃ vinīlanti ^b^vinīlakaṃ^eb^. maṃsussadaṭṭhānesu rattavaṇṇassa pubbasannicayaṭṭhānesu setavaṇṇassa yebhuyyena ca nīlavaṇṇassa nīlaṭṭhāne nīlasāṭakapārutasseva chavasarīrassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. paribhinnaṭṭhānehi navahi vā vaṇamukhehi vissandamānaṃ pubbaṃ vipubbaṃ, vipubbameva ^a^V3.0106^ea^ ^b^vipubbakaṃ^eb^. paṭikūlattā vā kucchitaṃ vipubbanti vipubbakaṃ. vipubbakaṃ jātaṃ tathābhāvaṃ gatanti ^b^vipubbakajātaṃ^eb^.

[03] ^b^so^eb^ ^a^P3.0359^ea^ ^b^imameva kāya^eb^nti so bhikkhu imaṃ attano kāyaṃ tena kāyena saddhiṃ ñāṇena upasaṃharati upaneti. kathaṃ? ^b^ayampi kho kāyo evaṃdhammo evaṃbhāvī evaṃanatīto^eb^ti. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- āyu usmā viññāṇanti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ atthitāya ayaṃ kāyo ṭhānagamanādikhamo hoti, imesaṃ pana vigamā ayampi evaṃdhammo evaṃpūtikasabhāvoyevāti. ^b^evaṃbhāvī^eb^ti evamevaṃ uddhumātādibhedo bhavissati. ^b^evaṃ anatīto^eb^ti evaṃ uddhumātādibhāvaṃ anatikkanto.

[03] ^b^khajjamāna^eb^nti ^a^M3.0104^ea^ udarādīsu nisīditvā udaramaṃsaoṭṭhamaṃsākkhikamaṃsādīni luñcitvā luñcitvā khādiyamānaṃ. ^b^samaṃsalohita^eb^nti sesāvasesamaṃsalohitayuttaṃ. ^b^nimmaṃsalohitamakkhita^eb^nti maṃse khīṇepi lohitaṃ na sussati, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ -- ``nimmaṃsalohitamakkhita''nti. ^b^aññenā^eb^ti aññena disābhāgena. ^b^hatthaṭṭhika^eb^nti catusaṭṭhibhedampi hatthaṭṭhikaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ vippakiṇṇaṃ. ^b^pādaṭṭhikā^eb^dīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^terovassikānī^eb^ti atikkantasaṃvaccharāni. ^b^pūtīnī^eb^ti abbhokāse ṭhitāni vātātapavuṭṭhisamphassena terovassikāneva pūtīni honti, antobhūmigatāni pana cirataraṃ tiṭṭhanti. ^b^cuṇṇakajātānī^eb^ti cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ hutvā vippakiṇṇāni. sabbattha ^a^P3.0360^ea^ ^b^so imamevā^eb^ti vuttanayena khajjamānādīnaṃ vasena yojanā kātabbā. ^b^asmimānasamugghātāyā^eb^ti asmīti pavattassa navavidhassa mānassa samugghātatthāya. ^b^anekadhātupaṭivedhāyā^eb^ti anekadhātūnaṃ paṭivijjhanatthāya. ^b^satova abhikkamatī^eb^ti gacchanto satipaññāhi samannāgatova gacchati. ^b^satova paṭikkamatī^eb^ti paṭinivattantopi satipaññāhi samannāgatova nivattati. sesapadesupi eseva nayo. ^b^satisampajaññāyā^eb^ti satiyā ca ñāṇassa ca atthāya. iti imasmiṃ sutte satiñāṇāni missakāni kathitānīti.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ dasame ^a^V3.0107^ea^ ^b^uccāvaca^eb^nti yaṃ kiñci mahantakhuddakaṃ, uccanīcaṃ vā. ^b^hīna^eb^nti nihīnaṃ. ^b^gamma^eb^nti gāmavāsikānaṃ dassanaṃ. ^b^pothujjanika^eb^nti puthujjanānaṃ santakaṃ. ^b^anariya^eb^nti na ariyaṃ na uttamaṃ na parisuddhaṃ. ^b^anatthasaṃhita^eb^nti na atthasannissitaṃ. ^b^na nibbidāyā^eb^ti na vaṭṭe nibbindanatthāya. ^b^na virāgāyā^eb^ti na rāgādīnaṃ virajjanatthāya. ^b^na nirodhāyā^eb^ti na rāgādīnaṃ appavattinirodhāya. ^b^na upasamāyā^eb^ti na rāgādīnaṃ vūpasamanatthāya. ^b^na abhiññāyā^eb^ti na abhijānanatthāya. ^b^na sambodhāyā^eb^ti na sambodhisaṅkhātassa catumaggañāṇassa paṭivijjhanatthāya. ^b^na nibbānāyā^eb^ti na nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya.

[03] ^b^niviṭṭhasaddho^eb^ti patiṭṭhitasaddho. ^b^niviṭṭhapemo^eb^ti ^a^P3.0361^ea^ patiṭṭhitapemo. ^b^ekantagato^eb^ti ekantaṃ gato, acalappattoti attho. ^b^abhippasanno^eb^ti ativiya pasanno. ^b^etadānuttariya^eb^nti etaṃ anuttaraṃ. ^b^hatthismimpi sikkhatī^eb^ti hatthinimittaṃ ^a^M3.0105^ea^ sikkhitabbaṃ hatthisippaṃ sikkhati. sesapadesupi eseva nayo. ^b^uccāvaca^eb^nti mahantakhuddakaṃ sippaṃ sikkhati.

[03] ^b^upaṭṭhitā pāricariye^eb^ti pāricariyāya paccupaṭṭhitā. ^b^bhāvayanti anussati^eb^nti anuttaraṃ anussatiṃ bhāventi. ^b^vivekappaṭisaṃyutta^eb^nti nibbānanissitaṃ katvā. ^b^khema^eb^nti nirupaddavaṃ. ^b^amatagāmina^eb^nti nibbānagāminaṃ, ariyamaggaṃ bhāventīti attho. ^b^appamāde pamoditā^eb^ti satiyā avippavāsasaṅkhāte appamāde āmoditā pamoditā. ^b^nipakā^eb^ti nepakkena samannāgatā. ^b^sīlasaṃvutā^eb^ti sīlena saṃvutā pihitā. ^b^te ve kālena paccentī^eb^ti te ve yuttappayuttakāle jānanti. ^b^yattha dukkhaṃ nirujjhatī^eb^ti yasmiṃ ṭhāne sakalaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ nirujjhati, taṃ amataṃ mahānibbānaṃ te bhikkhū jānantīti. imasmiṃ sutte cha anuttariyāni missakāni kathitānīti.
[06] anuttariyavaggo tatiyo.
[03] 31^b^.^eb^ catutthassa ^a^V3.0108^ea^ ^a^P3.0362^ea^ paṭhame ^b^sekhassā^eb^ti sattavidhassa sekhassa. puthujjane pana vattabbameva natthi. ^b^parihānāyā^eb^ti uparūpariguṇaparihānāya.

[03] 32-33^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^satthugāravatā^eb^ti satthari garubhāvo. ^b^dhammagāravatā^eb^ti navavidhe lokuttaradhamme garubhāvo. ^b^saṅghagāravatā^eb^ti saṅghe garubhāvo. ^b^sikkhāgāravatā^eb^ti tīsu sikkhāsu garubhāvo. ^b^appamādagāravatā^eb^ti appamāde garubhāvo. ^b^paṭisanthāragāravatā^eb^ti dhammāmisavasena duvidhe paṭisanthāre garubhāvo. satthā garu assāti ^b^satthugaru^eb^. dhammo garu assāti ^b^dhammagaru. tibbagāravo^eb^ti bahalagāravo. paṭisanthāre ^a^M3.0106^ea^ gāravo assāti ^b^paṭisanthāragāravo^eb^. tatiye ^b^sappatisso^eb^ti sajeṭṭhako sagāravo. hirottappaṃ panettha missakaṃ kathitaṃ.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^tisso nāma bhikkhū^eb^ti therasseva saddhivihāriko. ^b^mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo^eb^ti ijjhanaṭṭhena mahatī iddhi assāti mahiddhiko. anupharaṇaṭṭhena mahā ānubhāvo assāti mahānubhāvo. ^b^cirassaṃ kho, mārisa moggallāna, imaṃ pariyāyamakāsī^eb^ti evarūpaṃ loke pakatiyā piyasamudāhāravacanaṃ hoti. lokiyā ^a^P3.0363^ea^ hi cirassaṃ āgatampi anāgatapubbampi manāpajātiyaṃ āgataṃ disvā ``kuto bhavaṃ āgato, cirassaṃ bhavaṃ āgato, kathaṃ te idhāgamanamaggo ñāto, kiṃ maggamūḷhosī''tiādīni vadanti. ayaṃ pana āgatapubbattāyeva evamāha. thero hi kālena kālaṃ brahmalokaṃ gacchatiyeva. tattha ^b^pariyāyamakāsī^eb^ti vāraṃ akāsi. ^b^yadidaṃ idhāgamanāyā^eb^ti yo ayaṃ idhāgamanāya vāro, taṃ cirassaṃ akāsīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^idamāsanaṃ paññatta^eb^nti ^a^V3.0109^ea^ mahārahaṃ brahmapallaṅkaṃ paññāpetvā evamāha. ^b^aveccappasādenā^eb^ti adhigatena acalena maggappasādena. imasmiṃ sutte sotāpattimaggañāṇaṃ kathitaṃ.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^vijjābhāgiyā^eb^ti vijjākoṭṭhāsikā. ^b^aniccasaññā^eb^ti aniccānupassanāñāṇe uppannasaññā. ^b^anicce dukkhasaññā^eb^ti dukkhānupassanāñāṇe uppannasaññā. ^b^dukkhe anattasaññā^eb^ti anattānupassanāñāṇe uppannasaññā. ^b^pahānasaññā^eb^ti pahānānupassanāñāṇe uppannasaññā. ^b^virāgasaññā^eb^ti virāgānupassanāñāṇe uppannasaññā. ^b^nirodhasaññā^eb^ti nirodhānupassanāñāṇe uppannasaññā.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^M3.0107^ea^ ^b^vivādamūlānī^eb^ti vivādassa mūlāni. ^b^kodhano^eb^ti kujjhanalakkhaṇena kodhena samannāgato. ^b^upanāhī^eb^ti verāppaṭinissaggalakkhaṇena upanāhena samannāgato. ^b^ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussāna^eb^nti dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vivādo kathaṃ devamanussānaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattati? kosambakakkhandhake viya dvīsu bhikkhūsu vivādaṃ āpannesu tasmiṃ vihāre tesaṃ antevāsikā vivadanti, tesaṃ ovādaṃ gaṇhanto bhikkhunisaṅgho vivadati. tato tesaṃ upaṭṭhākā vivadanti, atha manussānaṃ ārakkhadevatā ^a^P3.0364^ea^ dve koṭṭhāsā honti. tathā dhammavādīnaṃ ārakkhadevatā dhammavādiniyo honti, adhammavādīnaṃ adhammavādiniyo. tato ārakkhadevatānaṃ mittā bhummadevatā bhijjanti. evaṃ paramparāya yāva brahmalokā ṭhapetvā ariyasāvake sabbe devamanussā dve koṭṭhāsā honti. dhammavādīhi pana adhammavādinova bahutarā honti. tato yaṃ bahukehi gahitaṃ, taṃ gacchanti. dhammaṃ vissajjetvā bahutarāva adhammaṃ gaṇhanti. te adhammaṃ purakkhatvā viharantā apāye nibbattanti. evaṃ dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vivādo devamanussānaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya hoti. ^b^ajjhattaṃ vā^eb^ti tumhākaṃ abbhantaraparisāya. ^b^bahiddhā^eb^ti paresaṃ parisāya.

[03] ^b^makkhī^eb^ti paresaṃ guṇamakkhanalakkhaṇena makkhena samannāgato. ^b^paḷāsī^eb^ti yugaggāhalakkhaṇena ^a^V3.0110^ea^ paḷāsena samannāgato. ^b^issukī^eb^ti parassa sakkārādīni issāyanalakkhaṇāya issāya samannāgato. ^b^maccharī^eb^ti āvāsamacchariyādīhi samannāgato. ^b^saṭho^eb^ti kerāṭiko. ^b^māyāvī^eb^ti katapaṭicchādako. ^b^pāpiccho^eb^ti asantasambhāvanicchako dussīlo. ^b^micchādiṭṭhī^eb^ti natthikavādī, ahetuvādī, akiriyavādī. ^b^sandiṭṭhiparāmāsī^eb^ti sayaṃ diṭṭhameva parāmasati. ^b^ādhānaggāhī^eb^ti daḷhaggāhī. ^b^duppaṭinissaggī^eb^ti na sakkā hoti gahitaṃ vissajjāpetuṃ. imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭameva kathitaṃ.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^P3.0365^ea^ ^b^veḷukaṇḍakī^eb^ti veḷukaṇḍakanagaravāsinī. ^b^chaḷaṅgasamannāgata^eb^nti chahi guṇaṅgehi samannāgataṃ. ^b^dakkhiṇaṃ patiṭṭhāpetī^eb^ti dānaṃ deti. ^b^pubbeva dānā sumano^eb^ti dānaṃ dassāmīti māsaḍḍhamāsato paṭṭhāya ^a^M3.0108^ea^ somanassappatto hoti. ettha hi pubbecetanā dassāmīti cittuppādakālato paṭṭhāya ``ito uṭṭhitena dānaṃ dassāmī''ti khettaggahaṇaṃ ādiṃ katvā cintentassa labbhati. ^b^dadaṃ cittaṃ pasādetī^eb^ti evaṃ vuttā muñcacetanā pana dānakāleyeva labbhati. ^b^datvā attamano hotī^eb^ti ayaṃ pana aparacetanā aparāparaṃ anussarantassa labbhati. ^b^vītarāgā^eb^ti vigatarāgā khīṇāsavā. ^b^rāgavinayāya vā paṭipannā^eb^ti rāgavinayapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannā. ukkaṭṭhadesanā cesā, na kevalaṃ pana khīṇāsavānaṃ, anāgāmi-sakadāgāmi-sotāpannānampi antamaso tadahupabbajitassa bhaṇḍagāhakasāmaṇerassāpi dinnā dakkhiṇā chaḷaṅgasamannāgatāva hoti. sopi hi sotāpattimaggatthameva pabbajito.

[03] ^b^yaññassa sampadā^eb^ti dānassa paripuṇṇatā. ^b^saññatā^eb^ti sīlasaññamena saññatā. ^b^sayaṃ ācamayitvānā^eb^ti attanāva hatthapāde dhovitvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā. ^b^sakehi pāṇibhī^eb^ti attano hatthehi. sayehītipi pāṭho. ^b^saddho^eb^ti ratanattayaguṇe saddahanto. ^b^muttena cetasā^eb^ti lābhamacchariyādīhi vimuttena cittena. ^b^abyāpajjhaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0366^ea^ ^b^sukhaṃ loka^eb^nti niddukkhaṃ uḷārasukhasomanassaṃ devalokaṃ.

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^V3.0111^ea^ ^b^addasaṃ vā assosiṃ vā^eb^ti akkhīni ummīletvā mā addasaṃ, asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne vasatīti mā assosiṃ, kathentassa vā vacanaṃ mā assosiṃ. ^b^kathañhi nāmā^eb^ti kena nāma kāraṇena. ^b^ārambhadhātū^eb^ti ārabhanavasena pavattavīriyaṃ. ^b^nikkamadhātū^eb^ti kosajjato nikkhamanasabhāvaṃ vīriyaṃ. ^b^parakkamadhātū^eb^ti parakkamasabhāvo. ^b^thāmadhātū^eb^ti thāmasabhāvo. ^b^ṭhitidhātū^eb^ti ṭhitisabhāvo. ^b^upakkamadhātū^eb^ti upakkamasabhāvo. sabbaṃ cetaṃ tena tenākārena pavattassa vīriyasseva nāmaṃ.

[03] 39-40^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^kammāna^eb^nti vaṭṭagāmikammānaṃ. ^b^samudayāyā^eb^ti piṇḍakaraṇatthāya. ^b^nidāna^eb^nti paccayo. ^b^lobhajenā^eb^ti lobhato jātena. ^b^na^eb^ ^a^M3.0109^ea^ ^b^paññāyantī^eb^ti ``evarūpena kammena nibbattā''ti na dissanti. sukkapakkhe ^b^kammāna^eb^nti vivaṭṭagāmikammānaṃ. iti imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ. dasame ^b^niculavane^eb^ti mahāmucalindavane. ^b^saddhammo^eb^ti sāsanasaddhammo.

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ ekādasame ^b^cetovasippatto^eb^ti cittavasibhāvaṃ patto. ^b^pathavītveva adhimucceyyā^eb^ti thaddhākāraṃ pathavīdhātūti sallakkheyya. ^b^yaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0367^ea^ ^b^nissāyā^eb^ti yaṃ vijjamānaṃ thaddhākāraṃ pathavīdhātuṃ nissāya amuṃ dārukkhandhaṃ pathavītveva adhimucceyya, sā ettha pathavīdhātu atthīti. iminā nayena sesapadānipi veditabbāni. yatheva hi tasmiṃ thaddhākārā pathavīdhātu atthi, evaṃ yūsākārā āpodhātu, uṇhākārā tejodhātu, vitthambhanākārā vāyodhātu, rattavaṇṇamhi sāre padumapupphavaṇṇā subhadhātu, pūtibhūte cuṇṇe ceva pheggupapaṭikāsu ca amanuññavaṇṇā asubhadhātu, taṃ nissāya amuṃ dārukkhandhaṃ asubhantveva adhimucceyya sallakkheyyāti. imasmiṃ sutte missakavihāro nāma kathito.

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ dvādasame ^a^V3.0112^ea^ ^b^gāmantavihāri^eb^nti gāmantasenāsanavāsiṃ. ^b^samāhitaṃ nisinna^eb^nti tasmiṃ gāmantasenāsane samādhiṃ appetvā nisinnaṃ. ^b^idānima^eb^nti idāni imaṃ. ^b^samādhimhā cāvessatī^eb^ti samādhito uṭṭhāpessati. ^b^na attamano homī^eb^ti na sakamano homi. ^b^pacalāyamāna^eb^nti niddāyamānaṃ. ^b^ekatta^eb^nti ekasabhāvaṃ, ekaggatābhūtaṃ araññasaññaṃyeva citte karissatīti attho. ^b^anurakkhissatī^eb^ti anuggaṇhissati. ^b^avimuttaṃ vā cittaṃ vimocessatī^eb^ti aññasmiṃ kāle avimuttaṃ cittaṃ idāni pañcahi vimuttīhi vimocayissati. ^b^riñcatī^eb^ti vajjeti vissajjeti. ^b^paṭipaṇāmetvā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0368^ea^ panuditvā vissajjetvā. ^b^uccārapassāvakammāyā^eb^ti uccārapassāvakaraṇatthāya. iminā ettakena ṭhānena satthārā araññasenāsanassa vaṇṇo kathito. suttassa pana paṭhamakoṭṭhāse yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttamevāti.
[06] devatāvaggo catuttho.

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ pañcamassa ^a^M3.0110^ea^ paṭhame ^b^āyasmatā ānandena saddhi^eb^nti idaṃ ``āyāmānandā''ti theraṃ āmantetvā gatattā vuttaṃ, satthā pana anūnehi pañcahi bhikkhusatehi parivuto tattha agamāsīti veditabbo. ^b^tenupasaṅkamī^eb^ti teheva pañcahi bhikkhusatehi parivuto upasaṅkami. ^b^parisiñcitvā^eb^ti vohāravacanametaṃ, nhāyitvāti attho. ^b^pubbāpayamāno^eb^ti rattadupaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvā uttarāsaṅgacīvaraṃ dvīhi hatthehi gahetvā pacchimalokadhātuṃ piṭṭhito katvā puratthimalokadhātuṃ abhimukho vodakabhāvena gattāni pubbasadisāni kurumāno aṭṭhāsīti attho. bhikkhusaṅghopi tena tena ṭhānena otaritvā nhatvā paccuttaritvā satthāraṃyeva parivāretvā aṭṭhāsi. iti tasmiṃ samaye ^a^V3.0113^ea^ ākāsato patamānaṃ rattasuvaṇṇakuṇḍalaṃ viya sūriyo pacchimalokadhātuṃ paṭipajji, parisuddharajatamaṇḍalo viya pācīnalokadhātuto cando abbhuggañchi, majjhaṭṭhānepi pañcabhikkhusataparivāro sammāsambuddho chabbaṇṇabuddharasmiyo ^a^P3.0369^ea^ vissajjetvā pubbakoṭṭhakanadītīre lokaṃ alaṅkurumāno aṭṭhāsi.

[03] ^b^tena kho pana samayena...pe0... seto nāma nāgo^eb^ti setavaṇṇatāya evaṃ laddhanāmo hatthināgo. ^b^mahātūriyatāḷitavāditenā^eb^ti mahantena tūriyatāḷitavāditena. tattha paṭhamaṃ saṅghaṭṭanaṃ tāḷitaṃ nāma hoti, tato paraṃ vāditaṃ. ^b^jano^eb^ti hatthidassanatthaṃ sannipatitamahājano. ^b^disvā evamāhā^eb^ti aṅgapaccaṅgāni ghaṃsitvā nhāpetvā uttāretvā bahitīre ṭhapetvā gattāni vodakāni katvā hatthālaṅkārena alaṅkataṃ taṃ mahānāgaṃ disvā idaṃ ``abhirūpo vata, bho''ti pasaṃsāvacanamāha. ^b^kāyupapanno^eb^ti sarīrasampattiyā upapanno, paripuṇṇaṅgapaccaṅgoti attho. ^b^āyasmā udāyī^eb^ti paṭisambhidāppatto kāḷudāyitthero. ^b^etadavocā^eb^ti taṃ mahājanaṃ hatthissa vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇantaṃ disvā ``ayaṃ jano ahetukapaṭisandhiyaṃ nibbattahatthino vaṇṇaṃ katheti, na buddhahatthissa. ahaṃ dāni iminā hatthināgena upamaṃ katvā buddhanāgassa vaṇṇaṃ ^a^M3.0111^ea^ kathessāmī''ti cintetvā etaṃ ``hatthimeva nu kho, bhante''tiādivacanaṃ avoca. tattha ^b^mahanta^eb^nti ārohasampannaṃ. ^b^brahanta^eb^nti pariṇāhasampannaṃ. ^b^evamāhā^eb^ti evaṃ vadati. atha bhagavā yasmā ayaṃ nāgasaddo hatthimhiceva assagoṇauragarukkhamanussesu cāpi pavattati, tasmā ^b^hatthimpi kho^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] ^b^āgu^eb^nti ^a^P3.0370^ea^ pāpakaṃ lāmakaṃ akusaladhammaṃ. ^b^tamahaṃ nāgoti brūmī^eb^ti taṃ ahaṃ imehi tīhi dvārehi dasannaṃ akusalakammapathānaṃ dvādasannañca akusalacittānaṃ akaraṇato nāgoti vadāmi. ayañhi na āguṃ karotīti iminā atthena nāgo. ^b^imāhi gāthāhi anumodāmī^eb^ti imāhi catusaṭṭhipadāhi soḷasahi gāthāhi anumodāmi abhinandāmi.

[03] ^b^manussabhūta^eb^nti devādibhāvaṃ anupagantvā manussameva bhūtaṃ. ^b^attadanta^eb^nti attanāyeva dantaṃ, na aññehi damathaṃ upanītaṃ. bhagavā hi attanā uppāditeneva maggadamathena cakkhutopi danto, sotatopi, ghānatopi, jivhātopi, kāyatopi, manatopīti imesu chasu ṭhānesu danto santo nibbuto parinibbuto. tenāha -- ``attadanta''nti. ^b^samāhita^eb^nti duvidhenāpi samādhinā samāhitaṃ. ^a^V3.0114^ea^ ^b^iriyamāna^eb^nti viharamānaṃ. ^b^brahmapathe^eb^ti seṭṭhapathe, amatapathe, nibbānapathe. ^b^cittassūpasame rata^eb^nti paṭhamajjhānena pañca nīvaraṇāni vūpasametvā, dutiyajjhānena vitakkavicāre, tatiyajjhānena pītiṃ, catutthajjhānena sukhadukkhaṃ vūpasametvā tasmiṃ cittassūpasame rataṃ abhirataṃ.

[03] ^b^namassantī^eb^ti kāyena namassanti, vācāya namassanti, manasā namassanti, dhammānudhammapaṭipattiyā namassanti, sakkaronti garuṃ karonti. ^b^sabbadhammānapāragu^eb^nti sabbesaṃ khandhāyatanadhātudhammānaṃ abhiññāpāragū, pariññāpāragū, pahānapāragū, bhāvanāpāragū, sacchikiriyāpāragū, samāpattipāragūti chabbidhena pāragamanena pāragataṃ pārappattaṃ matthakappattaṃ. ^b^devāpi taṃ namassantī^eb^ti dukkhappattā subrahmadevaputtādayo ^a^P3.0371^ea^ sukhappattā ca sabbeva dasasahassacakkavāḷavāsino devāpi tumhe namassanti. ^b^iti me arahato suta^eb^nti iti mayā catūhi kāraṇehi arahāti laddhavohārānaṃ tumhākaṃyeva santike sutanti dīpeti.

[03] ^b^sabbasaṃyojanātīta^eb^nti ^a^M3.0112^ea^ sabbāni dasavidhasaṃyojanāni atikkantaṃ. ^b^vanā nibbanamāgata^eb^nti kilesavanato nibbanaṃ kilesavanarahitaṃ nibbānaṃ āgataṃ sampattaṃ. ^b^kāmehi nekkhammarata^eb^nti duvidhehi kāmehi nikkhantattā pabbajjā aṭṭha samāpattiyo cattāro ca ariyamaggā kāmehi nekkhammaṃ nāma, tattha rataṃ abhirataṃ. ^b^muttaṃ selāva kañcana^eb^nti seladhātuto muttaṃ kañcanasadisaṃ.

[03] ^b^sabbe accarucī^eb^ti sabbasatte atikkamitvā pavattaruci. aṭṭhamakañhi atikkamitvā pavattarucitāya sotāpanno accaruci nāma, sotāpannaṃ atikkamitvā pavattarucitāya sakadāgāmī...pe0... khīṇāsavaṃ atikkamitvā pavattarucitāya paccekasambuddho, paccekasambuddhaṃ atikkamitvā pavattarucitāya sammāsambuddho accaruci nāma. ^b^himavāvaññe siluccaye^eb^ti yathā himavā pabbatarājā aññe pabbate atirocati, evaṃ atirocatīti attho. ^b^saccanāmo^eb^ti tacchanāmo bhūtanāmo āguṃ akaraṇeneva nāgoti evaṃ avitathanāmo.
[03] ^b^soracca^eb^nti sucisīlaṃ. ^b^avihiṃsā^eb^ti karuṇā ca karuṇāpubbabhāgo ca. ^b^pādā nāgassa te duve^eb^ti te buddhanāgassa duve purimapādā.

[03] ^b^tapo^eb^ti ^a^V3.0115^ea^ ^a^P3.0372^ea^ dhutasamādānaṃ. ^b^brahmacariya^eb^nti ariyamaggasīlaṃ. ^b^caraṇā nāgassa tyāpare^eb^ti te buddhanāgassa apare dve pacchimapādā. ^b^saddhāhattho^eb^ti saddhāmayāya soṇḍāya samannāgato. ^b^upekkhāsetadantavā^eb^ti chaḷaṅgupekkhāmayehi setadantehi samannāgato.

[03] ^b^sati gīvā^eb^ti yathā nāgassa aṅgapaccaṅgasmiṃ sirājālānaṃ gīvā patiṭṭhā, evaṃ buddhanāgassa soraccādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ sati. tena vuttaṃ -- ``sati gīvā''ti. ^b^siro paññā^eb^ti yathā hatthināgassa siro uttamaṅgo, evaṃ buddhanāgassa sabbaññutañāṇaṃ. tena hi so sabbadhamme jānāti. tena vuttaṃ -- ``siro paññā''ti. ^b^vīmaṃsā dhammacintanā^eb^ti yathā hatthināgassa aggasoṇḍo vīmaṃsā nāma hoti. so tāya thaddhamudukaṃ khāditabbākhāditabbañca vīmaṃsati, tato pahātabbaṃ pajahati, ādātabbaṃ ādiyati, evameva buddhanāgassa dhammakoṭṭhāsaparicchedakañāṇasaṅkhātā dhammacintanā vīmaṃsā. tena hi ñāṇena so bhabbābhabbe jānāti. tena vuttaṃ -- ``vīmaṃsā dhammacintanā''ti ^a^M3.0113^ea^. ^b^dhammakucchisamātapo^eb^ti dhammo vuccati catutthajjhānasamādhi, kucchiyeva samātapo kucchisamātapo. samātapo nāma samātapanaṭṭhānaṃ. dhammo kucchisamātapo assāti dhammakucchisamātapo. catutthajjhānasamādhismiṃ ṭhitassa hi te te iddhividhādidhammā ijjhanti, tasmā so kucchisamātapoti vutto. ^b^viveko^eb^ti ^a^P3.0373^ea^ kāyacittaupadhiviveko. yathā nāgassa vāladhi makkhikā vāreti, evaṃ tathāgatassa viveko gahaṭṭhapabbajite vāreti. tasmā so ^b^vāladhī^eb^ti vutto.

[03] ^b^jhāyī^eb^ti duvidhena jhānena jhāyī. ^b^assāsarato^eb^ti nāgassa hi assāsapassāsā viya buddhanāgassa phalasamāpatti, tattha rato, assāsapassāsehi viya tāya vinā na vattatīti attho. ^b^sabbattha saṃvuto^eb^ti sabbadvāresu saṃvuto. ^b^anavajjānī^eb^ti sammāājīvena uppannabhojanāni. ^b^sāvajjānī^eb^ti pañcavidhamicchājīvavasena uppannabhojanāni.

[03] ^b^aṇuṃthūla^eb^nti khuddakañca mahantañca. ^b^sabbaṃ chetvāna bandhana^eb^nti sabbaṃ dasavidhampi saṃyojanaṃ chinditvāna. ^b^nupalippati lokenā^eb^ti lokena saddhiṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhilepehi na lippati. ^b^mahāginī^eb^ti mahāaggi. ^b^viññūhi desitā^eb^ti idha paṭisambhidāppatto kāḷudāyittherova viññū paṇḍito, tena desitāti attho. ^b^viññassanti mahānāgā, nāgaṃ nāgena desita^eb^nti udāyittheranāgena desitaṃ buddhanāgaṃ itare khīṇāsavā nāgā vijānissanti.

[03] ^b^sarīraṃ^eb^ ^a^V3.0116^ea^ ^b^vijahaṃ nāgo, parinibbissatī^eb^ti bodhipallaṅke kilesaparinibbānena parinibbuto, yamakasālantare anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyissati. evaṃ paṭisambhidāppatto udāyitthero soḷasahi gāthāhi catusaṭṭhiyā padehi dasabalassa vaṇṇaṃ kathento desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi ^a^P3.0374^ea^. bhagavā anumodi. desanāvasāne caturāsītipāṇasahassāni amatapānaṃ piviṃsūti.

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^kathaṃ kathaṃ nāmā^eb^ti kena kena kāraṇena. ^b^aññeyyo^eb^ti ājānitabbo. ^b^yatra hi nāmā^eb^ti yasmiṃ nāma dhamme. ^b^samasamagatikā^eb^ti ^a^M3.0114^ea^ samabhāveneva samagatikā. ^b^bhavissantī^eb^ti jātā. ^b^sakadāgāmipatto tusitaṃ kāyaṃ upapanno^eb^ti sakadāgāmipuggalo hutvā tusitabhavaneyeva nibbatto. ^b^kathaṃ kathaṃ nāmā^eb^ti kena kena nu kho kāraṇena, kiṃ nu kho jānitvā desito, udāhu ajānitvāti. thero kāraṇaṃ ajānanto ^b^evaṃ kho panetaṃ bhagini bhagavatā byākata^eb^nti āha.

[03] ^b^ammakā ammakapaññā^eb^ti itthī hutvā itthisaññāya eva samannāgatā. ^b^ke ca purisapuggalaparopariyañāṇe^eb^ti ettha purisapuggalaparopariyañāṇaṃ vuccati purisapuggalānaṃ tikkhamuduvasena indriyaparopariyañāṇaṃ. tasmā kā ca bālā migasālā, ke ca purisapuggalānaṃ indriyaparopariyañāṇe appaṭihatavisayā sammāsambuddhā, ubhayametaṃ dūre suvidūreti ayamettha saṅkhepo.

[03] idāni migasālāya attano dūrabhāvaṃ dassento ^b^chayime, ānandā^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^sorato hotī^eb^ti pāpato suṭṭhu orato virato hoti. suratotipi pāṭho. ^b^abhinandanti sabrahmacārī ekattavāsenā^eb^ti tena saddhiṃ ekatovāsena ^a^P3.0375^ea^ sabrahmacārī abhinandanti tussanti. ekantavāsenātipi pāṭho, satatavāsenāti attho. ^b^savanenapi akataṃ hotī^eb^ti sotabbayuttakaṃ asutaṃ hoti. ^b^bāhusaccenapi akataṃ hotī^eb^ti ettha bāhusaccaṃ vuccati vīriyaṃ, vīriyena kattabbayuttakaṃ akataṃ hotīti attho. ^b^diṭṭhiyāpi appaṭividdhaṃ hotī^eb^ti diṭṭhiyā paṭivijjhitabbaṃ appaṭividdhaṃ ^a^V3.0117^ea^ hoti. ^b^sāmāyikampi vimuttiṃ na labhatī^eb^ti kālānukālaṃ dhammassavanaṃ nissāya pītipāmojjaṃ na labhati. ^b^hānagāmīyeva hotī^eb^ti parihānimeva gacchati.

[03] ^b^pamāṇikā^eb^ti puggalesu pamāṇaggāhakā. ^b^paminantī^eb^ti pametuṃ tuletuṃ ārabhanti. ^b^eko hīno^eb^ti eko guṇehi hīno. ^b^eko paṇīto^eb^ti eko guṇehi paṇīto. ^b^taṃ hī^eb^ti taṃ pamāṇakaraṇaṃ.

[03] ^b^abhikkantataro^eb^ti sundarataro. ^b^paṇītataro^eb^ti uttamataro. ^b^dhammasoto nibbahatī^eb^ti sūraṃ hutvā pavattamānavipassanāñāṇaṃ nibbahati, ariyabhūmiṃ ^a^M3.0115^ea^ sampāpeti. ^b^tadantaraṃ ko jāneyyā^eb^ti taṃ antaraṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ aññatra tathāgatena ko jāneyyāti attho.

[03] ^b^kodhamāno^eb^ti kodho ca māno ca. ^b^lobhadhammā^eb^ti lobhoyeva. ^b^vacīsaṅkhārā^eb^ti ālāpasallāpavasena vacanāneva. ^b^yo vā panassa mādiso^eb^ti yo vā pana aññopi mayā sadiso sammāsambuddhoyeva ^a^P3.0376^ea^ assa, so puggalesu pamāṇaṃ gaṇheyyāti attho. ^b^khaññatī^eb^ti guṇakhaṇanaṃ pāpuṇāti. ^b^ime kho, ānanda, cha puggalā^eb^ti dve soratā, dve adhigatakodhamānalobhadhammā, dve adhigatakodhamānavacīsaṅkhārāti ime cha puggalā. ^b^gati^eb^nti ñāṇagatiṃ. ^b^ekaṅgahīnā^eb^ti ekekena guṇaṅgena hīnā. pūraṇo sīlena visesī ahosi, isidatto paññāya. pūraṇassa sīlaṃ isidattassa paññāṭhāne ṭhitaṃ, isidattassa paññā pūraṇassa sīlaṭṭhāne ṭhitāti.

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^dāliddiya^eb^nti daliddabhāvo. ^b^kāmabhogino^eb^ti kāme bhuñjanakasattassa. ^b^assako^eb^ti attano santakena rahito. ^b^anāḷhiko^eb^ti na aḍḍho. ^b^iṇaṃ ādiyatī^eb^ti jīvituṃ asakkonto iṇaṃ ādiyati. ^b^vaḍḍhiṃ paṭissuṇātī^eb^ti dātuṃ asakkonto vaḍḍhiṃ dassāmīti paṭijānāti. ^b^anucarantipi na^eb^nti parisamajjhagaṇamajjhādīsu ātapaṭhapanapaṃsuokiraṇādīhi vippakāraṃ pāpento pacchato pacchato anubandhanti. ^b^saddhā natthī^eb^ti okappanakasaddhāmattakampi natthi. ^b^hirī natthī^eb^ti hirīyanākāramattakampi natthi. ^b^ottappaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0377^ea^ ^b^natthī^eb^ti bhāyanākāramattakampi natthi. ^b^vīriyaṃ natthī^eb^ti kāyikavīriyamattakampi natthi. ^b^paññā natthī^eb^ti kammassakatapaññāmattakampi ^a^V3.0118^ea^ natthi. ^b^iṇādānasmiṃ vadāmī^eb^ti iṇaggahaṇaṃ vadāmi. ^b^mā maṃ jaññū^eb^ti mā maṃ jānātu.

[03] ^b^dāliddiyaṃ dukkha^eb^nti dhanadaliddabhāvo dukkhaṃ. ^b^kāmalābhābhijappina^eb^nti kāmalābhaṃ patthentānaṃ. ^b^pāpakammavinibbayo^eb^ti pāpakammavaḍḍhako. ^b^saṃsappatī^eb^ti paripphandati. ^b^jāna^eb^nti jānanto. ^b^yassa vippaṭisārajā^eb^ti ye assa ^a^M3.0116^ea^ vippaṭisārato jātā. ^b^yonimaññatara^eb^nti ekaṃ tiracchānayoniṃ. ^b^dadaṃ cittaṃ pasādaya^eb^nti cittaṃ pasādento dadamāno.

[03] ^b^kaṭaggāho^eb^ti jayaggāho, anaparādhaggāho hoti. ^b^gharamesino^eb^ti gharāvāsaṃ pariyesantassa vasamānassa vā. ^b^cāgo puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatī^eb^ti cāgoti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ puññaṃ vaḍḍhati. cāgā puññanti vā pāṭho. ^b^patiṭṭhitā^eb^ti patiṭṭhitasaddhā nāma sotāpannassa saddhā. ^b^hirimano^eb^ti hirisampayuttacitto. ^b^nirāmisaṃ sukha^eb^nti tīṇi jhānāni nissāya uppajjanakasukhaṃ. ^b^upekkha^eb^nti catutthajjhānupekkhaṃ. ^b^āraddhavīriyo^eb^ti paripuṇṇapaggahitavīriyo. ^b^jhānāni^eb^ ^a^P3.0378^ea^ ^b^upasampajjā^eb^ti cattāri jhānāni patvā. ^b^ekodi nipako sato^eb^ti ekaggacitto kammassakatañāṇasatīhi ca samannāgato.

[03] ^b^evaṃ ñatvā yathābhūta^eb^nti evaṃ ettakaṃ kāraṇaṃ yathāsabhāvaṃ jānitvā. ^b^sabbasaṃyojanakkhaye^eb^ti nibbāne. ^b^sabbaso^eb^ti sabbākārena. ^b^anupādāyā^eb^ti aggahetvā. ^b^sammā cittaṃ vimuccatī^eb^ti idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- sabbasaṃyojanakkhayasaṅkhāte nibbāne sabbaso anupādiyitvā sammā hetunā nayena maggacittaṃ vimuccati. ``etaṃ ñatvā yathābhūtaṃ, sabbasaṃyojanakkhaya''ntipi pāḷiyaṃ likhitaṃ, tassa etaṃ sabbasaṃyojanakkhayasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñatvāti attho. purimapacchimehi pana saddhiṃ na ghaṭīyati.

[03] ^b^tassa sammā vimuttassā^eb^ti tassa sammā vimuttassa khīṇāsavassa. ^b^ñāṇaṃ hotī^eb^ti paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ hoti. ^b^tādino^eb^ti taṃsaṇṭhitassa. ^b^akuppā^eb^ti akuppārammaṇattā kuppakāraṇānaṃ kilesānañca abhāvena akuppā. ^b^vimuttī^eb^ti maggavimuttipi phalavimuttipi. ^b^bhavasaṃyojanakkhaye^eb^ti bhavasaṃyojanakkhayasaṅkhāte nibbāne bhavasaṃyojanānañca khayante uppannā. ^b^etaṃ kho paramaṃ ñāṇa^eb^nti etaṃ maggaphalañāṇaṃ paramañāṇaṃ nāma. ^b^sukhamanuttara^eb^nti etadeva maggaphalasukhaṃ anuttaraṃ ^a^V3.0119^ea^ sukhaṃ nāma. ^b^āṇaṇyamuttama^eb^nti sabbesaṃ aṇaṇānaṃ khīṇāsavo uttamāṇaṇo ^a^P3.0379^ea^, tasmā arahattaphalaṃ āṇaṇyamuttamanti arahattaphalena desanāya kūṭaṃ gaṇhi. imasmiñca sutte vaṭṭameva kathetvā gāthāsu vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitanti.

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^M3.0117^ea^ ^b^cetīsū^eb^ti cetiraṭṭhe. ^b^sayaṃjātiya^eb^nti evaṃnāmake nigame. ^b^mahācundo^eb^ti dhammasenāpatissa kaniṭṭhabhātiko. dhamme yogo anuyogo etesanti ^b^dhammayogā^eb^. dhammakathikānaṃ etaṃ nāmaṃ. jhāyantīti ^b^jhāyī. apasādentī^eb^ti ghaṭṭenti hiṃsanti. ^b^jhāyantī^eb^ti cintenti. ^b^pajjhāyantī^eb^tiādīni upasaggavasena vaḍḍhitāni. ^b^kimime jhāyantī^eb^ti kiṃ nāma ime jhāyanti. ^b^kintime jhāyantī^eb^ti kimatthaṃ ime jhāyanti. ^b^kathaṃ ime jhāyantī^eb^ti kena kāraṇena ime jhāyanti. ^b^amataṃ dhātuṃ kāyena phusitvā viharantī^eb^ti maraṇavirahitaṃ nibbānadhātuṃ sandhāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā viharantā anukkamena taṃ nāmakāyena phusitvā viharanti. ^b^gambhīraṃ atthapada^eb^nti guḷhaṃ paṭicchannaṃ khandhadhātuāyatanādiatthaṃ. ^b^paññāya^eb^ ^a^P3.0380^ea^ ^b^ativijjha passantī^eb^ti sahavipassanāya maggapaññāya paṭivijjhitvā passanti. imasmiṃ panatthe sammasanapaṭivedhapaññāpi uggahaparipucchāpaññāpi vaṭṭatiyevāti.

[03] 47-48^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^santaṃ vā ajjhatta^eb^nti niyakajjhatte vijjamānaṃ. ^b^lobho^eb^tiādīhi tīṇi akusalamūlāni dassitāni. ^b^lobhadhammā^eb^tiādīhi taṃsampayuttakā dhammā. chaṭṭhe ^b^kāyasandosa^eb^nti kāyadvārassa dussanākāraṃ. sesadvayepi eseva nayo. imesu dvīsu suttesu paccavekkhaṇāva kathitā.

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^vusitavā^eb^ti vutthabrahmacariyavāso. ^b^katakaraṇīyo^eb^ti catūhi maggehi kattabbaṃ katvā ṭhito. ^b^ohitabhāro^eb^ti khandhabhāraṃ kilesabhāraṃ abhisaṅkhārabhārañca otāretvā ṭhito. ^b^anuppattasadattho^eb^ti ^a^V3.0120^ea^ sadattho vuccati arahattaṃ, taṃ pattoti attho. ^b^parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano^eb^ti khīṇabhavabandhano. ^b^sammadaññā vimutto^eb^ti sammā hetunā kāraṇena jānitvā vimutto. ^b^tassa na evaṃ hoti atthi me seyyoti vā^eb^tiādīhi seyyassa seyyohamasmīti mānādayo tayo mānā paṭikkhittā. na hi khīṇāsavassa ``atthi mayhaṃ seyyo, atthi sadiso, atthi hīno''ti māno hoti. ^b^natthi me seyyo^eb^tiādīhipi teyeva ^a^M3.0118^ea^ paṭikkhittā. na hi khīṇāsavassa ``ahameva seyyo, ahaṃ sadiso, ahaṃ hīno, aññe seyyādayo natthī''ti evaṃ māno hoti.

[03] ^b^acirapakkantesū^eb^ti ^a^P3.0381^ea^ arahattaṃ byākaritvā aciraṃyeva pakkantesu. ^b^aññaṃ byākarontī^eb^ti arahattaṃ kathenti. ^b^hasamānakā maññe aññaṃ byākarontī^eb^ti hasamānā viya kathenti. ^b^vighātaṃ āpajjantī^eb^ti dukkhaṃ āpajjanti.

[03] ^b^na ussesu na omesu, samatte nopanīyare^eb^ti ettha ^b^ussā^eb^ti ussitatā seyyapuggalā. ^b^omā^eb^ti hīnā. ^b^samatto^eb^ti sadiso. iti imesu tīsupi seyyahīnasadisesu khīṇāsavā mānena na upanīyare, na upanenti, na upagacchantīti attho. ^b^khīṇā jātī^eb^ti khīṇā tesaṃ jāti. ^b^vusitaṃ brahmacariya^eb^nti vutthaṃ maggabrahmacariyaṃ. ^b^caranti saṃyojanavippamuttā^eb^ti sabbasaṃyojanehi vimuttā hutvā caranti. suttepi gāthāyampi khīṇāsavo kathito.

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^hatūpanisaṃ hotī^eb^ti hatūpanissayaṃ hoti. ^b^sīlavipannassā^eb^ti vipannasīlassa. ^b^yathābhūtañāṇadassana^eb^nti taruṇavipassanāñāṇaṃ. ^b^nibbidāvirāgo^eb^ti ettha nibbidā balavavipassanā, virāgo ariyamaggo. ^b^vimuttiñāṇadassana^eb^nti ettha ^b^vimuttī^eb^ti arahattaphalaṃ, ^b^ñāṇadassana^eb^nti paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ. ^b^upanissayasampannaṃ hotī^eb^ti sampannaupanissayaṃ hoti. imasmiṃ sutte sīlānurakkhaṇaindriyasaṃvaro kathito.

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^V3.0121^ea^ ^b^kittāvatā^eb^ti kittakena. ^b^assutañcevā^eb^ti aññasmiṃ kāle assutapubbaṃ. ^b^na sammosaṃ gacchantī^eb^ti vināsaṃ na gacchanti. ^b^cetaso samphuṭṭhapubbā^eb^ti cittena phusitapubbā. ^b^samudācarantī^eb^ti ^a^P3.0382^ea^ manodvāre caranti. ^b^aviññātañca vijānātī^eb^ti aññasmiṃ kāle aviññātakāraṇaṃ jānāti. ^b^pariyāpuṇātī^eb^ti vaḷañjeti katheti. ^b^desetī^eb^ti pakāseti. ^b^paraṃ vācetī^eb^ti paraṃ uggaṇhāpeti.

[03] ^b^āgatāgamā^eb^ti ^a^M3.0119^ea^ dīghādīsu yo koci āgamo āgato etesanti āgatāgamā. ^b^dhammadharā^eb^ti suttantapiṭakadharā. ^b^vinayadharā^eb^ti vinayapiṭakadharā. ^b^mātikādharā^eb^ti dvepātimokkhadharā. ^b^paripucchatī^eb^ti anusandhipubbāparaṃ pucchati. ^b^paripañhatī^eb^ti idañcidañca pucchissāmīti paritulati paricchindati. ^b^idaṃ, bhante, katha^eb^nti, bhante, idaṃ anusandhipubbāparaṃ kathaṃ hotīti pucchati. ^b^imassa kvattho^eb^ti imassa bhāsitassa ko atthoti pucchati. ^b^avivaṭa^eb^nti avivaritaṃ. ^b^vivarantī^eb^ti pākaṭaṃ karonti. ^b^kaṅkhāṭhāniyesū^eb^ti kaṅkhāya kāraṇabhūtesu. tattha yasmiṃ dhamme kaṅkhā uppajjati, sveva kaṅkhāṭhāniyo nāmāti veditabbo.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^bhogādhippāyā^eb^ti bhogasaṃharaṇatthaṃ ṭhapitādhippāyā pavattājjhāsayā. ^b^paññūpavicārā^eb^ti paññavanto bhaveyyāmāti evaṃ paññatthāya pavattūpavicārā. ayameva nesaṃ vicāro citte upavicarati. ^b^balādhiṭṭhānā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0383^ea^ balakāyādhiṭṭhānā. balakāyañhi laddhā te laddhapatiṭṭhā nāma honti. ^b^pathavibhinivesā^eb^ti pathavisāmino bhavissāmāti evaṃ pathaviatthāya katacittābhinivesā. ^b^issariyapariyosānā^eb^ti rajjābhisekapariyosānā. abhisekañhi patvā te pariyosānappattā nāma honti. iminā nayena sabbattha attho veditabbo.

[03] sesapadesu panettha ayamadhippāyo -- brāhmaṇā tāva mante labhitvā laddhapatiṭṭhā nāma honti, gahapatikā yaṃkiñci sippaṃ, itthī kuladāyajjasāmikaṃ puttaṃ, corā yaṃkiñci āvudhasatthaṃ ^a^V3.0122^ea^, samaṇā sīlaparipuṇṇā laddhapatiṭṭhā nāma honti. tasmā ^b^mantādhiṭṭhānā^eb^tiādīni vuttāni.

[03] brāhmaṇānañca ``yaññaṃ yajissāmā''ti cittaṃ abhinivisati, brahmaloke patte pariyosānappattā nāma honti. tasmā te ^b^yaññābhinivesā brahmalokapariyosānā^eb^ti vuttā. kammantakaraṇatthāya mano etesaṃ abhinivisatīti ^b^kammantābhinivesā^eb^. kamme niṭṭhite pariyosānappattā nāma hontīti ^b^niṭṭhitakammantapariyosānā^eb^.

[03] ^b^purisādhippāyā^eb^ti purisesu pavattājjhāsayā. alaṅkāratthāya mano upavicarati etissāti ^b^alaṅkārūpavicārā^eb^. asapattī hutvā ekikāva ^a^M3.0120^ea^ ghare vaseyyanti evamassā cittaṃ abhinivisatīti ^b^asapattībhinivesā^eb^. gharāvāsissariye laddhe pariyosānappattā nāma hontīti issariyapariyosānā.

[03] parabhaṇḍassa ^a^P3.0384^ea^ ādāne adhippāyo etesanti ^b^ādānādhippāyā^eb^. gahane nilīyanaṭṭhāne etesaṃ mano upavicaratīti ^b^gahanūpavicārā^eb^. andhakāratthāya etesaṃ cittaṃ abhinivisatīti ^b^andhakārābhinivesā^eb^. adassanappattā pariyosānappattā hontīti ^b^adassanapariyosānā^eb^.

[03] adhivāsanakkhantiyañca sucibhāvasīle ca adhippāyo etesanti ^b^khantisoraccādhippāyā^eb^. akiñcanabhāve niggahaṇabhāve cittaṃ etesaṃ abhinivisatīti ^b^ākiñcaññābhinivesā^eb^. nibbānappattā pariyosānappattā hontīti ^b^nibbānapariyosānā^eb^.

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ ekādasame ^b^samadhiggayhā^eb^ti suṭṭhu gaṇhitvā. ^b^jaṅgalānaṃ pāṇāna^eb^nti pathavītalacārīnaṃ sapādakapāṇānaṃ. ^b^padajātānī^eb^ti padāni. ^b^samodhānaṃ gacchantī^eb^ti odhānaṃ upanikkhepaṃ gacchanti. ^b^aggamakkhāyatī^eb^ti seṭṭhaṃ akkhāyati. ^b^pabbajalāyako^eb^ti pabbajatiṇacchedako. ^b^odhunātī^eb^ti heṭṭhā mukhaṃ dhunāti. ^b^nidhunātī^eb^ti ubhohi passehi dhunāti. ^b^nicchādetī^eb^ti bāhāya vā paharati, rukkhe vā paharati. ^b^ambapiṇḍiyā^eb^ti ambaphalapiṇḍiyā. ^b^vaṇṭūpanibandhanānī^eb^ti ^a^P3.0385^ea^ vaṇṭe upanibandhanāni ^a^V3.0123^ea^, vaṇṭe vā patiṭṭhitāni. ^b^tadanvayāni bhavantī^eb^ti vaṇṭānuvattakāni bhavanti, ambapiṇḍidaṇḍakānuvattakāni bhavantītipi attho. ^b^khuddarājāno^eb^ti khuddakarājāno, pakatirājāno vā.

[03] 54^b^.^eb^ dvādasame ^b^sabbaso^eb^ti sabbesu. ^b^sattasu vihāresū^eb^ti sattasu pariveṇesu. ^b^paribhāsatī^eb^ti paribhavati bhayaṃ upadaṃseti. ^b^vihiṃsatī^eb^ti viheṭheti. ^b^vitudatī^eb^ti vijjhati. ^b^roseti vācāyā^eb^ti vācāya ghaṭṭeti. ^b^pakkamantī^eb^ti disā pakkamanti. ^b^na saṇṭhahantī^eb^ti nappatiṭṭhahanti. ^b^riñcantī^eb^ti ^a^M3.0121^ea^ chaḍḍenti vissajjenti. ^b^pabbājeyyāmā^eb^ti nīhareyyāma. ^b^handā^eb^ti vavassaggatthe nipāto. ^b^ala^eb^nti yuttametaṃ, yaṃ taṃ pabbājeyyunti attho. ^b^kiṃ te iminā^eb^ti kiṃ tava iminā jātibhūmiyaṃ vāsena. ^b^tīradassiṃ sakuṇa^eb^nti disākākaṃ. ^b^muñcantī^eb^ti disādassanatthaṃ vissajjenti. ^b^sāmantā^eb^ti avidūre. samantātipi pāṭho, samantatoti attho. ^b^abhiniveso^eb^ti pattharitvā ṭhitasākhānaṃ niveso. ^b^mūlasantānakāna^eb^nti mūlānaṃ niveso.

[03] ^b^āḷhakathālikā^eb^ti taṇḍulāḷhakassa bhattapacanathālikā. ^b^khuddaṃ madhu^eb^nti khuddamakkhikāhi kataṃ daṇḍakamadhuṃ. ^b^anelaka^eb^nti ^a^P3.0386^ea^ niddosaṃ. ^b^na ca sudaṃ aññamaññassa phalāni hiṃsantī^eb^ti aññamaññassa koṭṭhāse phalāni na hiṃsanti. attano koṭṭhāsehi mūlaṃ vā tacaṃ vā pattaṃ vā chindanto nāma natthi, attano attano sākhāya heṭṭhā patitāneva paribhuñjanti. aññassa koṭṭhāsato aññasa koṭṭhāsaṃ parivattitvā gatampi ``na amhākaṃ sākhāya phala''nti ñatvā no khādanti. ^b^yāvadatthaṃ bhakkhitvā^eb^ti kaṇṭhappamāṇena khāditvā. ^b^sākhaṃ bhañjitvā^eb^ti chattappamāṇamattaṃ chinditvā chāyaṃ katvā pakkāmi. ^b^yatra hi nāmā^eb^ti yo hi nāma. ^b^pakkamissatī^eb^ti pakkanto. ^b^nādāsī^eb^ti devatāya ānubhāvena phalameva na gaṇhi. evañhi sā adhiṭṭhāsi.

[03] ^b^tenupasaṅkamī^eb^ti janapadavāsīhi gantvā, ``mahārāja, rukkho phalaṃ na gaṇhi, amhākaṃ nu kho doso tumhāka''nti vutte ``neva mayhaṃ doso atthi, na jānapadānaṃ, amhākaṃ vijite adhammo nāma na vattati, kena nu kho kāraṇena rukkho na phalito, sakkaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchissāmī''ti ^a^V3.0124^ea^ cintetvā yena sakko devānamindo tenupasaṅkami. ^b^pavattesī^eb^ti parivattesi. ^b^ummūlamakāsī^eb^ti uddhaṃmūlaṃ akāsi. ^b^api nu tva^eb^nti api nu tava. ^b^aṭṭhitāyevā^eb^ti aṭṭhitāya eva. ^b^sacchavīnī^eb^ti samānacchavīni pakatiṭṭhāne ṭhitāni. ^b^na paccakkosatī^eb^ti nappaṭikkosati. ^b^rosanta^eb^nti ghaṭṭentaṃ. ^b^bhaṇḍanta^eb^nti paharantaṃ.

[03] ^b^sunetto^eb^ti ^a^P3.0387^ea^ nettā vuccanti akkhīni, tesaṃ sundaratāya sunetto. ^b^titthakaro^eb^ti sugatiogāhanatitthassa kārako. ^b^vītarāgo^eb^ti vikkhambhanavasena ^a^M3.0122^ea^ vigatarāgo. ^b^pasavatī^eb^ti paṭilabhati. ^b^diṭṭhisampanna^eb^nti dassanasampannaṃ, sotāpannanti attho. ^b^khanti^eb^nti attano guṇakhaṇanaṃ. ^b^yathāmaṃ sabrahmacārīsū^eb^ti yathā imaṃ sabrahmacārīsu akkosanaparibhāsanaṃ, aññaṃ evarūpaṃ guṇakhantiṃ na vadāmīti attho. ^b^na no samasabrahmacārīsū^eb^ti ettha samajano nāma sakajano vuccati. tasmā na no sakesu samānabrahmacārīsu cittāni paduṭṭhāni bhavissantīti ayamettha attho.

[03] ^b^jotipālo ca govindo^eb^ti nāmena jotipālo ṭhānena mahāgovindo. ^b^sattapurohito^eb^ti reṇuādīnaṃ sattannaṃ rājūnaṃ purohito. ^b^ahiṃsakā atītaṃse^eb^ti ete cha satthāro atītaṃse ahiṃsakā ahesuṃ. ^b^nirāmagandhā^eb^ti kodhāmagandhena nirāmagandhā. ^b^karuṇevimuttā^eb^ti karuṇajjhāne adhimuttā, karuṇāya ca karuṇāpubbabhāge ca ṭhitā. ^b^yete^eb^ti ete, ayameva vā pāṭho. ^b^na sādhurūpaṃ āsīde^eb^ti sādhusabhāvaṃ na ghaṭṭeyya. ^b^diṭṭhiṭṭhānappahāyina^eb^nti ^a^P3.0388^ea^ dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatappahāyinaṃ. ^b^sattamo^eb^ti arahattato paṭṭhāya sattamo. ^b^avītarāgo^eb^ti avigatarāgo. etena anāgāmibhāvaṃ paṭikkhipati. ^b^pañcindriyā mudū^eb^ti pañca vipassanindriyāni mudūni. tassa hi tāni sakadāgāmiṃ upādāya mudūni nāma honti. ^b^vipassanā^eb^ti saṅkhārapariggahañāṇaṃ. ^b^pubbeva upahaññatī^eb^ti paṭhamataraññeva upahaññati. ^b^akkhato^eb^ti guṇakhaṇanena akkhato anupahato hutvā. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
[06] dhammikavaggo pañcamo.
[06] paṭhamapaṇṇāsakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 55^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhassa ^a^V3.0125^ea^ ^a^M3.0123^ea^ paṭhame ^b^soṇo^eb^ti sukhumālasoṇatthero. ^b^sītavane^eb^ti evaṃnāmake susāne. tasmiṃ kira paṭipāṭiyā pañca caṅkamanapaṇṇasālāsatāni māpitāni, tesu thero attano sappāyacaṅkamanaṃ gahetvā samaṇadhammaṃ karoti. tassa āraddhavīriyassa hutvā caṅkamato pādatalāni bhijjiṃsu, jāṇūhi caṅkamato jāṇukānipi hatthatalānipi bhijjiṃsu, chiddāni ahesuṃ. evaṃ āraddhavīriyo viharanto obhāsanimittamattakampi dassetuṃ nāsakkhi. tassa vīriyena kilamitakāyassa koṭiyaṃ pāsāṇaphalake nisinnassa yo vitakko udapādi, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^atha kho āyasmato^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^a^P3.0389^ea^ ^b^āraddhavīriyā^eb^ti paripuṇṇapaggahitavīriyā. ^b^na anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccatī^eb^ti sace hi ahaṃ ugghaṭitaññū vā assaṃ vipañcitaññū vā neyyo vā, nūna me cittaṃ vimucceyya. addhā panasmi padaparamo, yena me cittaṃ na vimuccatīti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā ^b^saṃvijjanti kho panā^eb^tiādīni cintesi. tattha ^b^bhogā^eb^ti upayogatthe paccattaṃ.

[03] ^b^pāturahosī^eb^ti therassa cittācāraṃ ñatvā ``ayaṃ soṇo ajja sītavane padhānabhūmiyaṃ nisinno imaṃ vitakkaṃ vitakketi, gantvāssa vitakkaṃ sahotthaṃ gaṇhitvā vīṇopamaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathessāmī''ti pamukhe pākaṭo ahosi. ^b^paññatte āsane^eb^ti padhānikabhikkhū attano vasanaṭṭhāne ovadituṃ āgatassa buddhassa bhagavato nisīdanatthaṃ yathālābhena āsanaṃ paññāpetvāva padhānaṃ karonti, aññaṃ alabhamānā purāṇapaṇṇānipi santharitvā upari saṅghāṭiṃ paññapenti. theropi āsanaṃ paññāpetvā padhānaṃ akāsi. taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ -- ``paññatte āsane''ti.

[03] ^b^taṃ kiṃ maññasī^eb^ti satthā ``imassa bhikkhuno avasesakammaṭṭhānehi attho natthi, ayaṃ gandhabbasippe ^a^V3.0126^ea^ cheko ciṇṇavasī, attano visaye kathiyamānaṃ ^a^M3.0124^ea^ khippameva sallakkhessatī''ti vīṇopamaṃ kathetuṃ ``taṃ kiṃ maññasī''tiādimāha. ^b^vīṇāya tantissare kusalatā^eb^ nāma vīṇāya vādanakusalatā, so ca tattha kusalo. mātāpitaro hissa ``amhākaṃ putto aññaṃ sippaṃ sikkhanto kāyena kilamissati, idaṃ pana sayane ^a^P3.0390^ea^ nisinneneva sakkā uggaṇhitu''nti gandhabbasippameva uggaṇhāpesuṃ. tassa --
[21] ``satta sarā tayo gāmā, mucchanā ekavīsati.
[22] ṭhānā ekūnapaññāsa, iccete saramaṇḍalā''ti.. --

[25] ādikaṃ gandhabbasippaṃ sabbameva paguṇaṃ ahosi. ^b^accāyatā^eb^ti atiāyatā kharamucchanā. ^b^saravatī^eb^ti sarasampannā. ^b^kammaññā^eb^ti kammakkhamā kammayoggā. ^b^atisithilā^eb^ti mandamucchanā. ^b^same guṇe patiṭṭhitā^eb^ti majjhime sare ṭhapetvā mucchitā.

[03] ^b^accāraddha^eb^nti atigāḷhaṃ. ^b^uddhaccāya saṃvattatī^eb^ti uddhatabhāvāya saṃvattati. ^b^atilīna^eb^nti atisithilaṃ. ^b^kosajjāyā^eb^ti kusītabhāvatthāya. ^b^vīriyasamathaṃ adhiṭṭhahā^eb^ti vīriyasampayuttaṃ samathaṃ adhiṭṭhaha, vīriyaṃ samathena yojehīti attho. ^b^indriyānañca samataṃ paṭivijjhā^eb^ti saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ samataṃ samabhāvaṃ adhiṭṭhāhi. tattha saddhaṃ paññāya, paññañca saddhāya, vīriyaṃ samādhinā, samādhiñca vīriyena yojayatā indriyānaṃ samatā adhiṭṭhitā nāma hoti. sati pana sabbatthikā, sā sadā balavatīyeva vaṭṭati. tañca pana tesaṃ yojanāvidhānaṃ visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 1.60-62) pakāsitameva. ^b^tattha ca nimittaṃ gaṇhāhī^eb^ti tasmiñca samabhāve sati yena ādāse mukhabimbeneva nimittena uppajjitabbaṃ, taṃ samathanimittaṃ vipassanānimittaṃ magganimittaṃ phalanimittañca ^a^P3.0391^ea^ gaṇhāhi nibbattehīti evamassa satthā arahatte pakkhipitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi.

[03] ^b^tattha ca nimittaṃ aggahesī^eb^ti samathanimittañca vipassanānimittañca aggahesi. ^b^cha ṭhānānī^eb^ti cha kāraṇāni. ^b^adhimutto hotī^eb^ti paṭivijjhitvā paccakkhaṃ katvā ṭhito hoti. ^b^nekkhammādhimutto^eb^tiādi sabbaṃ arahattavaseneva vuttaṃ. arahattañhi sabbakilesehi nikkhantattā ^b^nekkhammaṃ,^eb^ teheva pavivittattā ^b^paviveko,^eb^ byāpajjhābhāvato ^b^abyāpajjhaṃ,^eb^ taṇhākkhayante uppannattā ^a^M3.0125^ea^ ^b^taṇhākkhayo^eb^ ^a^V3.0127^ea^, upādānakkhayante uppannattā ^b^upādānakkhayo,^eb^ sammohābhāvato ^b^asammoho^eb^ti vuccati.

[03] ^b^kevalaṃ saddhāmattaka^eb^nti paṭivedharahitaṃ kevalaṃ paṭivedhapaññāya asammissakaṃ saddhāmattakaṃ. ^b^paṭicaya^eb^nti punappunaṃ karaṇena vaḍḍhiṃ. ^b^vītarāgattā^eb^ti maggapaṭivedhena rāgassa vigatattāyeva nekkhammasaṅkhātaṃ arahattaṃ paṭivijjhitvā sacchikatvā ṭhito hoti, phalasamāpattivihārena viharati, tanninnamānasoyeva ca hotīti attho. sesapadesupi eseva nayo.

[03] ^b^lābhasakkārasiloka^eb^nti catupaccayalābhañca tesaññeva sukatabhāvañca vaṇṇabhaṇanañca. ^b^nikāmayamāno^eb^ti icchamāno patthayamāno. ^b^pavivekādhimutto^eb^ti paviveke adhimutto arahanti evaṃ arahattaṃ byākarotīti attho.

[03] ^b^sīlabbataparāmāsa^eb^nti sīlañca vatañca parāmasitvā gahitaṃ gahaṇamattaṃ. ^b^sārato^eb^ ^a^P3.0392^ea^ ^b^paccāgacchanto^eb^ti sārabhāvena jānanto. ^b^abyāpajjhādhimutto^eb^ti abyāpajjhaṃ arahattaṃ byākaroti. imināva nayena sabbaṭṭhānesu attho daṭṭhabbo. apicettha ``nekkhammādhimuttoti imasmiṃyeva arahattaṃ kathitaṃ, sesesu pañcasu nibbāna''nti eke vadanti. apare ``asammohādhimuttoti ettheva nibbānaṃ kathitaṃ, sesesu arahatta''nti vadanti. ayaṃ panettha sāro -- sabbesveva tesu arahattampi nibbānampi kathitamevāti.

[03] ^b^bhusā^eb^ti balavanto dibbarūpasadisā. ^b^nevassa cittaṃ pariyādiyantī^eb^ti etassa khīṇāsavassa cittaṃ gahetvā ṭhātuṃ na sakkonti. kilesā hi uppajjamānā cittaṃ gaṇhanti nāma. ^b^amissīkata^eb^nti kilesā hi ārammaṇena saddhiṃ cittaṃ missaṃ karonti, tesaṃ abhāvā amissīkataṃ. ^b^ṭhita^eb^nti patiṭṭhitaṃ. ^b^āneñjappatta^eb^nti acalappattaṃ. ^b^vayañcassānupassatī^eb^ti tassa cesa cittassa uppādampi vayampi passati. ^b^bhusā vātavuṭṭhī^eb^ti balavā vātakkhandho. ^b^neva sampakampeyyā^eb^ti ekabhāgena cāletuṃ na sakkuṇeyya. ^b^na sampakampeyyā^eb^ti thūṇaṃ viya sabbabhāgato kampetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya. ^b^na sampavedheyyā^eb^ti vedhetvā pavedhetvā pātetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya.

[03] ^b^nekkhammaṃ^eb^ ^a^M3.0126^ea^ ^b^adhimuttassā^eb^ti arahattaṃ paṭivijjhitvā ṭhitassa khīṇāsavassa. sesapadesupi ^a^P3.0393^ea^ arahattameva ^a^V3.0128^ea^ kathitaṃ. ^b^upādānakkhayassa cā^eb^ti upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^asammohañca cetaso^eb^ti cittassa ca asammohaṃ adhimuttassa. ^b^disvā āyatanuppāda^eb^nti āyatanānaṃ uppādañca vayañca disvā. ^b^sammā cittaṃ vimuccatī^eb^ti sammā hetunā nayena imāya vipassanāpaṭipattiyā phalasamāpattivasena cittaṃ vimuccati, nibbānārammaṇe adhimuccati. atha vā iminā khīṇāsavassa paṭipadā kathitā. tassa hi āyatanuppādaṃ disvā imāya vipassanāya adhigatassa ariyamaggassānubhāvena sabbakilesehi sammā cittaṃ vimuccati. evaṃ tassa ^b^sammā vimuttassa...pe0... na vijjati^eb^. tattha ^b^santacittassā^eb^ti nibbutacittassa. sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.

[03] 56^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^samadhosī^eb^ti uṭṭhānākāraṃ dassesi. ^b^paṭikkamantī^eb^ti parihāyanti. ^b^no abhikkamantī^eb^ti na vaḍḍhanti. ^b^sīsaveṭhanaṃ dadeyyā^eb^ti sīsaṃ veṭhetvā daṇḍakena samparivattakaṃ bandheyya. ^b^indriyāni vippasīdiṃsū^eb^ti tasmiṃ maraṇasamaye cha indriyāni vippasannāni ahesuṃ. ^b^atthupaparikkhāyā^eb^ti atthānatthaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ upaparikkhane. ^b^anuttare upadhisaṅkhaye^eb^ti nibbāne. ^b^avimuttaṃ hotī^eb^ti arahattaphalena adhimuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 57^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^chaḷabhijātiyo^eb^ti cha jātiyo. ^b^tatrida^eb^nti tatrāyaṃ. ^b^luddā^eb^ti dāruṇā. ^b^bhikkhū^eb^ ^a^P3.0394^ea^ ^b^kaṇṭakavuttikā^eb^ti samaṇā nāmete. ^b^ekasāṭakā^eb^ti ekeneva pilotikakhaṇḍena purato paṭicchādanakā. ^b^akāmakassa bilaṃ olaggeyyu^eb^nti satthe gacchamāne goṇamhi mate gomaṃsamūlaṃ uppādanatthāya vibhajitvā khādamānā ekassa gomaṃsaṃ anicchantasseva koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā ``ayañca te khāditabbo, mūlañca dātabba''nti taṃ koṭṭhāsasaṅkhātaṃ bilaṃ olaggeyyuṃ, balakkārena hatthe ṭhapeyyunti attho. ^b^akhettaññunā^eb^ti abhijātipaññattiyā khettaṃ ajānantena. ^b^taṃ suṇāhī^eb^ti taṃ mama paññattiṃ suṇāhi. ^b^kaṇhābhijātiko^eb^ti kāḷakajātiko. ^b^kaṇhaṃ dhammaṃ abhijāyatī^eb^ti kaṇhasabhāvo hutvā jāyati nibbattati, kaṇhābhijātiyaṃ vā jāyati. ^b^nibbānaṃ^eb^ ^a^V3.0129^ea^ ^a^M3.0127^ea^ ^b^abhijāyatī^eb^ti nibbānaṃ pāpuṇāti, ariyabhūmisaṅkhātāya vā nibbānajātiyā jāyati.

[03] 58^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^saṃvarā pahātabbā^eb^ti saṃvarena pahātabbā. sesesupi eseva nayo. ^b^idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ sāsane. ^b^paṭisaṅkhā^eb^ti paṭisañjānitvā, paccavekkhitvāti attho. ^b^yoniso^eb^ti upāyena pathena. ettha ca asaṃvare ādīnavapaṭisaṅkhā yoniso paṭisaṅkhāti veditabbā. sā cāyaṃ ``varaṃ, bhikkhave, tattāya ayosalākāya ādittāya sampajjalitāya sajotibhūtāya cakkhundriyaṃ sampalimaṭṭhaṃ, na tveva cakkhuviññeyyesu rūpesu anubyañjanaso nimittaggāho''tiādinā ādittapariyāyena (saṃ0 ni0 4.235) veditabbā. ^b^cakkhundriyasaṃvarasaṃvuto^eb^ ^a^P3.0395^ea^ ^b^viharatī^eb^ti ettha cakkhumeva indriyaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ, saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro, pidahanato thakanatoti vuttaṃ hoti. satiyā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. cakkhundriye saṃvaro ^b^cakkhundriyasaṃvaro^eb^. javane uppajjamānopi hesa tasmiṃ dvāre kilesānaṃ uppattivāraṇato cakkhundriyasaṃvaroti vuccati. ^b^saṃvuto^eb^ti tena saṃvarena upeto. tathā hi ``pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto''ti imassa vibhaṅge ``iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti...pe0... samannāgato''ti vuttaṃ. atha vā saṃvarīti saṃvuto, thakesi pidahīti vuttaṃ hoti. cakkhundriyasaṃvarasaṃvutoti cakkhundriyasaṃvarasaṅkhātaṃ satikavāṭaṃ cakkhudvāre gharadvāre kavāṭaṃ viya saṃvari thakesi pidahīti vuttaṃ hoti. ayamevettha attho sundarataro. tathā hi ``cakkhundriyasaṃvaraṃ asaṃvutassa viharato, saṃvutassa viharato''ti etesu padesu ayamevattho dissatīti.

[03] ^b^yaṃ hissā^eb^tiādimhi yaṃ cakkhundriyasaṃvaraṃ assa bhikkhuno asaṃvutassa athaketvā apidahitvā viharantassāti attho. yekārassa vā esa yanti ādeso, ye assāti attho. ^b^āsavā vighātapariḷāhā^eb^ti cattāro āsavā ca aññe ca vighātakarā kilesapariḷāhā vipākapariḷāhā vā. cakkhudvārasmiñhi iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ āpāthagataṃ kāmassādavasena assādayato abhinandato kāmāsavo uppajjati, ``īdisaṃ aññasmimpi sugatibhave labhissāmī''ti bhavapatthanāya assādayato bhavāsavo ^a^M3.0128^ea^ uppajjati, sattoti vā sattassāti vā gaṇhato diṭṭhāsavo uppajjati, sabbeheva sahajātaṃ aññāṇaṃ avijjāsavoti cattāro āsavā uppajjanti ^a^V3.0130^ea^. etehi sampayuttā apare kilesā vighātapariḷāhā āyatiṃ vā tesaṃ vipākā tehipi asaṃvutasseva viharato uppajjeyyunti vuccanti. ^b^evaṃsa^eb^ ^a^P3.0396^ea^ ^b^te^eb^ti evaṃ assa te, etenupāyena na honti, no aññathāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^paṭisaṅkhā yoniso sotindriyasaṃvarasaṃvuto^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^ime vuccanti āsavā saṃvarā pahātabbā^eb^ti imesu chasu dvāresu cattāro cattāro katvā catuvīsati āsavā saṃvarena pahātabbāti vuccanti.

[03] ^b^paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvara^eb^ntiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 1.18) sīlakathāya vuttameva. ^b^yaṃ hissā^eb^ti yañhi cīvaraṃ piṇḍapātādīsu vā aññataraṃ assa. ^b^appaṭisevato^eb^ti evaṃ yoniso appaṭisevantassa. imasmiṃ vāre aladdhaṃ cīvarādiṃ patthayato laddhaṃ vā assādayato kāmāsavassa uppatti veditabbā, īdisaṃ aññasmimpi sugatibhave labhissāmīti bhavapatthanāya assādayato bhavāsavassa, ahaṃ labhāmi na labhāmīti vā mayhaṃ vā idanti attasaññaṃ adhiṭṭhahato diṭṭhāsavassa, sabbeheva pana sahajāto avijjāsavoti evaṃ catunnaṃ āsavānaṃ uppatti vighātapariḷāhāva navavedanuppādanatopi veditabbā. ^b^ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, āsavā paṭisevanā pahātabbā^eb^ti ime ekamekasmiṃ paccaye cattāro cattāro katvā soḷasa āsavā iminā ñāṇasaṃvarasaṅkhātena paccavekkhaṇapaṭisevanena pahātabbāti vuccanti.

[03] ^b^paṭisaṅkhā yoniso khamo hoti sītassā^eb^ti upāyena pathena paccavekkhitvā khantā hoti sītassa, sītaṃ khamati sahati, na avīrapuriso viya appamattakenapi sītena calati kampati kammaṭṭhānaṃ vijahati. ^b^uṇhā^eb^dīsupi ^a^P3.0397^ea^ eseva nayo. ettha ca vacanameva ^b^vacanapatho^eb^ti veditabbo. ^b^dukkhāna^eb^ntiādīsu dukkhamanaṭṭhena dukkhā, bahalaṭṭhena tibbā, pharusaṭṭhena kharā, tikhiṇaṭṭhena kaṭukā, assādavirahato asātā, manaṃ avaḍḍhanato amanāpā, pāṇaharaṇasamatthatāya pāṇaharāti veditabbā. ^b^yaṃ hissā^eb^ti sītādīsu yaṃkiñci ekadhammampi assa. ^b^anadhivāsato^eb^ti anadhivāsentassa akkhamantassa ^a^M3.0129^ea^. āsavuppatti panettha evaṃ veditabbā -- sītena phuṭṭhassa uṇhaṃ patthayato kāmāsavo uppajjati, evaṃ sabbattha. ``natthi sugatibhave sītaṃ vā uṇhaṃ vā''ti bhavaṃ patthentassa bhavāsavo, mayhaṃ sītaṃ uṇhanti gāho diṭṭhāsavo, sabbeheva sampayutto avijjāsavoti. ^b^ime vuccantī^eb^ti ime sītādīsu ekamekassa vasena cattāro cattāro ^a^V3.0131^ea^ katvā aneke āsavā imāya khantisaṃvarasaṅkhātāya adhivāsanāya pahātabbāti vuccantīti attho.
