[03] ^b^paṭisaṅkhā yoniso caṇḍaṃ hatthiṃ parivajjetī^eb^ti ahaṃ samaṇoti na caṇḍassa hatthissa āsanne ṭhātabbaṃ. tatonidānañhi maraṇampi maraṇamattampi dukkhaṃ bhaveyyāti evaṃ upāyena pathena paccavekkhitvā caṇḍaṃ hatthiṃ parivajjeti paṭikkamati. esa nayo sabbattha. ^b^caṇḍa^eb^nti duṭṭhaṃ vāḷaṃ. ^b^khāṇu^eb^nti khadirakhāṇukādiṃ. ^b^kaṇṭakaṭṭhāna^eb^nti yattha kaṇṭakā vijjhanti, taṃ okāsaṃ. ^b^sobbha^eb^nti ^a^P3.0398^ea^ sabbato chinnataṭaṃ. ^b^papāta^eb^nti ekato chinnataṭaṃ. ^b^candanika^eb^nti ucchiṭṭhodakagabbhamalādīnaṃ chaḍḍanaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^oḷigalla^eb^nti tesaṃyeva kaddamādīnaṃ sandanokāsaṃ. taṃ jaṇṇumattampi asucibharitaṃ hoti. dvepi cetāni ṭhānāni amanussussadaṭṭhānāni honti, tasmā vajjetabbāni. ^b^anāsane^eb^ti ettha ayuttaṃ āsanaṃ anāsanaṃ, taṃ atthato aniyatavatthubhūtaṃ rahopaṭicchannāsananti veditabbaṃ. ^b^agocare^eb^ti etthapi ayutto gocaro agocaro. so vesiyādibhedato pañcavidho. ^b^pāpake mitte^eb^ti lāmake dussīle mittapatirūpake amitte. ^b^pāpakesū^eb^ti lāmakesu. ^b^okappeyyu^eb^nti saddaheyyuṃ adhimucceyyuṃ ``addhā ayamāyasmā akāsi vā karissati vā''ti. ^b^yaṃ hissā^eb^ti hatthiādīsu yaṃkiñci ekampi assa. āsavuppatti panettha evaṃ veditabbā -- hatthiādinidānena dukkhena phuṭṭhassa sukhaṃ patthayato kāmāsavo uppajjati, ``natthi sugatibhave īdisaṃ dukkha''nti bhavaṃ patthentassa bhavāsavo, maṃ hatthī maddati maṃ assoti gāho diṭṭhāsavo, sabbeheva sampayutto avijjāsavoti. ^b^ime vuccantī^eb^ti ime hatthiādīsu ekekassa vasena cattāro cattāro katvā aneke āsavā iminā sīlasaṃvarasaṅkhātena parivajjanena pahātabbāti vuccanti.

[03] ^b^paṭisaṅkhā^eb^ ^a^P3.0399^ea^ ^b^yoniso uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī^eb^ti ``itipāyaṃ vitakko akusalo, itipi sāvajjo, itipi dukkhavipāko, so ca kho ^a^M3.0130^ea^ attabyābādhāya saṃvattatī''tiādinā (ma0 ni0 1.207-208) nayena yoniso kāmavitakke ādīnavaṃ paccavekkhitvā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ārammaṇe uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāseti, cittaṃ āropetvā na vāseti, abbhantare vā na vāsetīti attho. anadhivāsento kiṃ karotīti? ^b^pajahati^eb^. kiṃ kacavaraṃ viya piṭakenāti? na hi, api ca kho naṃ ^b^vinodeti^eb^ tudati vijjhati nīharati. kiṃ balibaddaṃ viya patodenāti? na hi, atha kho naṃ ^b^byantīkaroti^eb^ vigatantaṃ karoti, yathāssa antopi nāvasissati ^a^V3.0132^ea^ antamaso bhaṅgamattampi, tathā naṃ karoti. kathaṃ pana naṃ tathā karotīti? ^b^anabhāvaṃ gameti^eb^ anu anu abhāvaṃ gameti, vikkhambhanappahānena yathā suvikkhambhito hoti, tathā karoti. sesavitakkadvayepi eseva nayo. ^b^uppannuppanne^eb^ti uppanne uppanne, uppannamatteyevāti vuttaṃ hoti. sakiṃ vā uppanne vinodetvā dutiye vāre ajjhupekkhitā na hoti, satakkhattumpi uppanne uppanne vinodetiyeva. ^b^pāpake akusale dhamme^eb^ti teyeva kāmavitakkādayo, sabbepi vā nava mahāvitakke. tattha tayo vuttā, avasesā ``ñātivitakko, janapadavitakko, amarāvitakko, parānuddayatāpaṭisaṃyutto vitakko, lābhasakkārasilokappaṭisaṃyutto vitakko, anavaññattippaṭisaṃyutto vitakko''ti (mahāni0 207) ime cha. ^b^yaṃ hissā^eb^ti etesu vitakkesu yaṃkiñci assa. kāmavitakko panettha kāmāsavo eva, tabbiseso bhavāsavo, taṃsampayutto diṭṭhāsavo, sabbavitakkesu avijjā avijjāsavoti evaṃ āsavuppatti veditabbā. ^b^ime^eb^ ^a^P3.0400^ea^ ^b^vuccantī^eb^ti ime kāmavitakkādivasena vuttappakārā āsavā iminā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vitakke ādīnavapaccavekkhaṇasahitena vīriyasaṃvarasaṅkhātena vinodanena pahātabbāti vuccanti.

[03] ^b^paṭisaṅkhā yoniso satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāvetī^eb^ti abhāvanāya ādīnavaṃ bhāvanāya ca ānisaṃsaṃ upāyena pathena paccavekkhitvā satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti. eseva nayo sabbattha. bojjhaṅgānaṃ bhāvanā heṭṭhā vitthāritāva. ^b^yaṃ hissā^eb^ti etesu bojjhaṅgesu yaṃkiñci assa. āsavuppattiyaṃ panettha imesaṃ ariyamaggasampayuttānaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ abhāvitattā ye uppajjeyyuṃ kāmāsavādayo āsavā, bhāvayato evaṃsa te ^a^M3.0131^ea^ na hontīti ayaṃ nayo veditabbo. ^b^ime vuccantī^eb^ti ime kāmāsavādayo āsavā imāya lokuttarāya bojjhaṅgabhāvanāya pahātabbāti vuccanti. imehi chahākārehi pahīnāsavaṃ bhikkhuṃ thomento ^b^yato kho, bhikkhave^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^yato^eb^ti sāmivacane to-kāro, yassāti vuttaṃ hoti. porāṇā pana yamhi kāleti vaṇṇayanti. ^b^ye āsavā saṃvarā pahātabbā, te saṃvarā pahīnā hontī^eb^ti ye āsavā saṃvarena pahātabbā, te saṃvareneva pahīnā honti, na appahīnesuyeva pahīnasaññī hotīti.

[03] 59^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^dārukammiko^eb^ti dāruvikkayena pavattitājīvo eko upāsako. ^b^kāsikacandana^eb^nti ^a^V3.0133^ea^ saṇhacandanaṃ. ^b^aṅgenā^eb^ti aguṇaṅgena, sukkapakkhe guṇaṅgena. ^b^nemantaniko^eb^ti nimantanaṃ gaṇhanako. ^b^saṅghe dānaṃ dassāmī^eb^ti bhikkhusaṅghassa dassāmi. so evaṃ vatvā satthāraṃ abhivādetvā pakkāmi. athassa ^a^P3.0401^ea^ aparabhāge pañcasatā kulūpakā bhikkhū gihibhāvaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. so ``kulūpakabhikkhū te vibbhantā''ti vutte ``kiṃ ettha mayha''nti vatvā cittuppādavemattamattampi na akāsi. idaṃ sandhāya satthā ^b^saṅghe te dānaṃ dadato cittaṃ pasīdissatī^eb^ti āha.

[03] 60^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^abhidhammakatha^eb^nti abhidhammamissakaṃ kathaṃ. ^b^kathaṃ opātetī^eb^ti tesaṃ kathaṃ vicchinditvā attano kathaṃ katheti. ^b^therānaṃ bhikkhūna^eb^nti karaṇatthe sāmivacanaṃ, therehi bhikkhūhi saddhinti attho. yā ca therānaṃ abhidhammakathā, taṃ ayampi kathetuṃ sakkotīti attho. ^b^cetopariyāya^eb^nti cittavāraṃ. ^b^idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ loke. ^b^soratasorato^eb^ti sūrato viya sūrato, soraccasamannāgato viyāti attho. ^b^nivātanivāto^eb^ti nivāto viya nivāto, nivātavutti viyāti attho. ^b^upasantupasanto^eb^ti upasanto viya upasanto ^a^M3.0132^ea^. ^b^vapakassateva satthārā^eb^ti satthu santikā apagacchati. ^b^saṃsaṭṭhassā^eb^ti pañcahi saṃsaggehi saṃsaṭṭhassa. ^b^vissaṭṭhassā^eb^ti vissajjitassa. ^b^pākatassā^eb^ti pākatindriyassa.

[03] ^b^kiṭṭhādo^eb^ti kiṭṭhakhādako. ^b^antaradhāpeyyā^eb^ti nāseyya. ^b^gopasū^eb^ti gāvo ca ajikā ca. ^b^sippisambuka^eb^nti ^a^P3.0402^ea^ sippiyo ca sambukā ca. ^b^sakkharakaṭhala^eb^nti sakkharā ca kaṭhalāni ca. ^b^ābhidosika^eb^nti abhiññātadosaṃ kudrūsakabhojanaṃ. ^b^nacchādeyyā^eb^ti na rucceyya. tattha yadetaṃ ^b^purisaṃ bhuttāvi^eb^nti upayogavacanaṃ, taṃ sāmiatthe daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^amuṃ hāvuso, purisa^eb^nti, āvuso, amuṃ purisaṃ.

[03] ^b^sabbanimittāna^eb^nti sabbesaṃ niccanimittādīnaṃ nimittānaṃ. ^b^animittaṃ cetosamādhi^eb^nti balavavipassanāsamādhiṃ. ^b^cīrikasaddo^eb^ti jhallikasaddo. ^b^sarissati nekkhammassā^eb^ti pabbajjāya guṇaṃ sarissati. ^b^arahataṃ ahosī^eb^ti bhagavato sāvakānaṃ arahantānaṃ antare eko arahā ahosi. ayañhi thero satta vāre gihī hutvā satta vāre pabbaji. kiṃ kāraṇā? kassapasammāsambuddhakāle ^a^V3.0134^ea^ kiresa ekassa bhikkhuno gihibhāve vaṇṇaṃ kathesi. so teneva kammena arahattassa upanissaye vijjamāneyeva satta vāre gihibhāve ca pabbajjāya ca sañcaranto sattame vāre pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti.

[03] 61^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^pārāyane metteyyapañhe^eb^ti pārāyanasamāgamamhi metteyyamāṇavassa pañhe. ^b^ubhonte viditvānā^eb^ti dve ante dve koṭṭhāse jānitvā. ^b^majjhe mantā na lippatī^eb^ti mantā vuccati paññā, tāya ubho ante viditvā majjhe na lippati, vemajjheṭṭhāne na lippati. ^b^sibbanimaccagā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0403^ea^ sibbanisaṅkhātaṃ taṇhaṃ atīto. ^b^phasso^eb^ti phassavasena nibbattattā ayaṃ attabhāvo. ^b^eko anto^eb^ti ayameko koṭṭhāso. ^b^phassasamudayo^eb^ti phasso samudayo assāti phassasamudayo, imasmiṃ attabhāve katakammaphassapaccayā nibbatto anāgatattabhāvo. ^b^dutiyo anto^eb^ti dutiyo koṭṭhāso. ^b^phassanirodho^eb^ti nibbānaṃ. ^b^majjhe^eb^ti sibbinitaṇhaṃ chetvā dvidhākaraṇaṭṭhena nibbānaṃ majjhe nāma hoti. ^b^taṇhā hi^eb^ ^a^M3.0133^ea^ ^b^naṃ sibbatī^eb^ti taṇhā naṃ attabhāvadvayasaṅkhātaṃ phassañca phassasamudayañca sibbati ghaṭṭeti. kiṃ kāraṇā? tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiyā. yadi hi taṇhā na sibbeyya, tassa tassa bhavassa nibbatti na bhaveyya. imasmiṃ ṭhāne koṭimajjhikūpamaṃ gaṇhanti. dvinnañhi kaṇḍānaṃ ekato katvā majjhe suttena saṃsibbitānaṃ koṭi majjhanti vuccati. sutte chinne ubho kaṇḍāni ubhato patanti. evamettha kaṇḍadvayaṃ viya vuttappakārā dve antā, sibbitvā ṭhitasuttaṃ viya taṇhā, sutte chinne kaṇḍadvayassa ubhatopatanaṃ viya taṇhāya niruddhāya antadvayaṃ niruddhameva hoti. ^b^ettāvatā^eb^ti ettakena iminā ubho ante viditvā taṇhāya majjhe anupalittabhāvena abhiññeyyaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ abhijānāti nāma, tīraṇapariññāya ca pahānapariññāya ca parijānitabbaṃ lokiyasaccadvayaṃ parijānāti nāma. ^b^diṭṭheva^eb^ ^a^P3.0404^ea^ ^b^dhamme^eb^ti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve. ^b^dukkhassantakaro hotī^eb^ti vaṭṭadukkhassa koṭikaro paricchedaparivaṭumakaro hoti nāma.

[03] dutiyavāre tiṇṇaṃ kaṇḍānaṃ vasena upamā veditabbā. tiṇṇañhi kaṇḍānaṃ suttena saṃsibbitānaṃ sutte chinne tīṇi kaṇḍāni tīsu ṭhānesu patanti, evamettha kaṇḍattayaṃ viya atītānāgatapaccuppannā khandhā, suttaṃ viya taṇhā. sā hi atītaṃ paccuppannena, paccuppannañca anāgatena ^a^V3.0135^ea^ saddhiṃ saṃsibbati. sutte chinne kaṇḍattayassa tīsu ṭhānesu patanaṃ viya taṇhāya niruddhāya atītānāgatapaccuppannā khandhā niruddhāva honti.

[03] tatiyavāre ^b^adukkhamasukhā majjhe^eb^ti dvinnaṃ vedanānaṃ antaraṭṭhakabhāvena majjhe. sukhañhi dukkhassa, dukkhaṃ vā sukhassa antaraṃ nāma natthi. ^b^taṇhā sibbinī^eb^ti vedanāsu nandirāgo vedanānaṃ upacchedaṃ nivāretīti tā sibbati nāma.
[03] catutthavāre ^b^viññāṇaṃ majjhe^eb^ti paṭisandhiviññāṇampi sesaviññāṇampi nāmarūpapaccayasamudāgatattā nāmarūpānaṃ majjhe nāma.

[03] pañcamavāre ^b^viññāṇaṃ majjhe^eb^ti kammaviññāṇaṃ majjhe, ajjhattikāyatanesu vā manāyatanena kammassa gahitattā idha yaṃkiñci viññāṇaṃ majjhe nāma, manodvāre vā āvajjanassa ajjhattikāyatananissitattā javanaviññāṇaṃ majjhe nāma.

[03] chaṭṭhavāre ^a^M3.0134^ea^ ^b^sakkāyo^eb^ti tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ. ^b^sakkāyasamudayo^eb^ti samudayasaccaṃ. ^b^sakkāyanirodho^eb^ti nirodhasaccaṃ. ^b^pariyāyenā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0405^ea^ tena tena kāraṇeneva. sesaṃ sabbattha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

[03] 62^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^aññataro^eb^ti devadattapakkhiko eko. ^b^samannāharitvā^eb^ti āvajjitvā. idaṃ so ``kiṃ nu kho bhagavatā jānitvā kathitaṃ, udāhu ajānitvā, ekaṃsikaṃ vā kathitaṃ udāhu vibhajjakathita''nti adhippāyena pucchati. ^b^āpāyiko^eb^ti apāye nibbattanako. ^b^nerayiko^eb^ti nirayagāmī. ^b^kappaṭṭho^eb^ti kappaṭṭhiyakammassa katattā kappaṃ ṭhassati. ^b^atekiccho^eb^ti na sakkā tikicchituṃ. ^b^dvejjha^eb^nti dvidhābhāvaṃ. ^b^vālaggakoṭinittudanamatta^eb^nti vālassa aggakoṭiyā dassetabbamattakaṃ, vālaggakoṭinipātamattakaṃ vā. ^b^purisindriyañāṇānī^eb^ti purisapuggalānaṃ indriyaparopariyattañāṇāni, indriyānaṃ tikkhamudubhāvajānanañāṇānīti attho.

[03] ^b^vijjamānā kusalāpi dhammā akusalāpi dhammā^eb^ti ettakā kusalā dhammā vijjanti, ettakā ^a^V3.0136^ea^ akusalā dhammāti jānāmi. ^b^antarahitā^eb^ti adassanaṃ gatā. ^b^sammukhībhūtā^eb^ti samudācāravasena pākaṭā jātā. ^b^kusalamūla^eb^nti kusalajjhāsayo. ^b^kusalā kusala^eb^nti tamhā kusalajjhāsayā aññampi kusalaṃ nibbattissati. ^b^sāradānī^eb^ti sārādāni gahitasārāni, saradamāse vā nibbattāni. ^b^sukhasayitānī^eb^ti ^a^P3.0406^ea^ sukhasannicitāni. ^b^sukhette^eb^ti maṇḍakhette. ^b^nikkhittānī^eb^ti vuttāni. ^b^sappaṭibhāgā^eb^ti sarikkhakā. ^b^abhido addharatta^eb^nti abhiaddharattaṃ addharatte abhimukhībhūte. ^b^bhattakālasamaye^eb^ti rājakulānaṃ bhattakālasaṅkhāte samaye. ^b^parihānadhammo^eb^ti ko evaṃ bhagavatā ñātoti? ajātasatturājā. so hi pāpamittaṃ nissāya maggaphalehi parihīno. aparepi suppabuddhasunakkhattādayo bhagavatā ñātāva. ^b^aparihānadhammo^eb^ti evaṃ bhagavatā ko ñāto? susīmo paribbājako aññe ca evarūpā. ^b^parinibbāyissatī^eb^ti evaṃ ko ñāto bhagavatāti? santatimahāmatto aññe ca evarūpā.

[03] 63^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^M3.0135^ea^ anibbiddhapubbe appadālitapubbe lobhakkhandhādayo nibbijjhati padāletīti ^b^nibbedhikapariyāyo,^eb^ nibbijjhanakāraṇanti attho. ^b^nidānasambhavo^eb^ti kāme nideti uppādanasamatthatāya niyyādetīti nidānaṃ. sambhavati tatoti sambhavo, nidānameva sambhavo ^b^nidānasambhavo. vemattatā^eb^ti nānākaraṇaṃ.

[03] ^b^kāmaguṇā^eb^ti kāmayitabbaṭṭhena kāmā, bandhanaṭṭhena guṇā ``antaguṇa''ntiādīsu viya. ^b^cakkhuviññeyyā^eb^ti cakkhuviññāṇena passitabbā. ^b^iṭṭhā^eb^ti pariyiṭṭhā vā hontu mā vā, iṭṭhārammaṇabhūtāti attho. ^b^kantā^eb^ti kamanīyā. ^b^manāpā^eb^ti manavaḍḍhanakā. ^b^piyarūpā^eb^ti piyajātikā. ^b^kāmūpasañhitā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0407^ea^ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjamānena kāmena upasañhitā. ^b^rajanīyā^eb^ti rāguppattikāraṇabhūtā. ^b^nete kāmā^eb^ti na ete kamanaṭṭhena kāmā nāma honti. ^b^saṅkapparāgo^eb^ti saṅkappavasena uppannarāgo. ^b^kāmo^eb^ti ayaṃ kāmappahānāya paṭipannehi pahātabbo. kamanaṭṭhena kāmā nāma. ^b^citrānī^eb^ti citravicitrārammaṇāni.

[03] ^b^phasso^eb^ti sahajātaphasso. ^b^kāmayamāno^eb^ti kāmaṃ kāmayamāno. ^b^tajjaṃ tajja^eb^nti tajjātikaṃ tajjātikaṃ. ^b^puññabhāgiya^eb^nti dibbe kāme patthetvā sucaritapāripūriyā devaloke nibbattassa ^a^V3.0137^ea^ attabhāvo puññabhāgiyo nāma, duccaritapāripūriyā apāye nibbattassa attabhāvo apuññabhāgiyo nāma. ^b^ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, kāmānaṃ vipāko^eb^ti ayaṃ duvidhopi kāmapatthanaṃ nissāya uppannattā kāmānaṃ vipākoti vuccati. ^b^so imaṃ nibbedhika^eb^nti so bhikkhu imaṃ chattiṃsaṭṭhānesu nibbijjhanakaṃ seṭṭhacariyaṃ jānāti. ^b^kāmanirodha^eb^nti kāmānaṃ nirodhane evaṃ laddhanāmaṃ. imasmiñhi ṭhāne brahmacariyasaṅkhāto maggova kāmanirodhoti vutto.

[03] ^b^sāmisā^eb^ti kilesāmisasampayuttā. iminā nayena sabbaṭhānesu attho veditabbo. apicettha ^b^vohāravepakka^eb^nti vohāravipākaṃ. kathāsaṅkhāto hi vohāro saññāya vipāko nāma. ^b^yathā^eb^ ^a^P3.0408^ea^ ^b^yathā na^eb^nti ettha ^b^naṃ^eb^-iti nipātamattameva. iti yasmā yathā yathā sañjānāti, tathā ^a^M3.0136^ea^ tathā evaṃsaññī ahosinti katheti, tasmā vohāravepakkāti attho.

[03] ^b^avijjā^eb^ti aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu aññāṇabhūtā bahalāvijjā. nirayaṃ gamentīti ^b^nirayagamanīyā,^eb^ niraye nibbattipaccayāti attho. sesesupi eseva nayo. ^b^cetanāha^eb^nti cetanaṃ ahaṃ. idha sabbasaṅgāhikā saṃvidahanacetanā gahitā. ^b^cetayitvā^eb^ti dvārappavattacetanā. ^b^manasā^eb^ti cetanāsampayuttacittena. ^b^nirayavedanīya^eb^nti niraye vipākadāyakaṃ. sesesupi eseva nayo. ^b^adhimatta^eb^nti balavadukkhaṃ. ^b^dandhavirāgī^eb^ti garukaṃ na khippaṃ saṇikaṃ vigacchanakadukkhaṃ. ^b^urattāḷiṃ kandatī^eb^ti uraṃ tāḷetvā rodati. ^b^pariyeṭṭhi^eb^nti pariyesanaṃ. ^b^ekapadaṃ dvipada^eb^nti ekapadamantaṃ vā dvipadamantaṃ vā, ko mantaṃ jānātīti attho. ^b^sammohavepakka^eb^nti sammohavipākaṃ. dukkhassa hi sammoho nissandavipāko nāma. dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. pariyesanāpi hi tassa nissandavipākoti. imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ.

[03] 64^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^āsabhaṃ ṭhāna^eb^nti seṭṭhaṃ niccalaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^sīhanāda^eb^nti ^a^P3.0409^ea^ abhītanādaṃ pamukhanādaṃ. ^b^brahmacakka^eb^nti seṭṭhañāṇacakkaṃ paṭivedhañāṇañceva desanāñāṇañca. ^b^ṭhānañca ṭhānato^eb^ti kāraṇañca kāraṇato. ^b^yampī^eb^ti yena ñāṇena. ^b^idampi tathāgatassā^eb^ti idampi ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇaṃ tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṃ nāma hoti. evaṃ sabbapadesu attho veditabbo. ^b^kammasamādānāna^eb^nti samādiyitvā katānaṃ kusalākusalakammānaṃ, kammameva vā kammasamādānaṃ. ^b^ṭhānaso hetuso^eb^ti paccayato ceva hetuto ^a^V3.0138^ea^ ca. tattha gatiupadhikālapayogā vipākassa ṭhānaṃ, kammaṃ hetu. ^b^jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīna^eb^nti catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ samādhīnaṃ navannaṃ anupubbasamāpattīnañca. ^b^saṃkilesa^eb^nti hānabhāgiyaṃ dhammaṃ. ^b^vodāna^eb^nti visesabhāgiyaṃ dhammaṃ. ^b^vuṭṭhāna^eb^nti ``vodānampi vuṭṭhānaṃ, tamhā tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhānampi vuṭṭhāna''nti (vibha0 828) evaṃ vuttaṃ paguṇajjhānañceva bhavaṅganaphalasamāpattiyo ca. heṭṭhimaṃ heṭṭhimañhi paguṇajjhānaṃ uparimassa uparimassa padaṭṭhānaṃ hoti, tasmā ``vodānampi vuṭṭhāna''nti vuttaṃ. bhavaṅgena pana ^a^M3.0137^ea^ sabbajjhānehi vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, phalasamāpattiyā nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti. taṃ sandhāya ``tamhā tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhānampi vuṭṭhāna''nti vuttaṃ. ^b^anekavihita^eb^ntiādīni visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 2.402) vaṇṇitāni. āsavakkhayañāṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttatthameva. purimassāpi ñāṇattayassa vitthārakathaṃ icchantena majjhimaṭṭhakathāya mahāsīhanādavaṇṇanā (ma0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.146 ādayo) oloketabbā. ^b^samāhitassā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0410^ea^ ekaggacittassa. ^b^samādhi maggo^eb^ti samādhi etesaṃ ñāṇānaṃ adhigamāya upāyo. ^b^asamādhī^eb^ti anekaggabhāvo. ^b^kummaggo^eb^ti micchāmaggo. imasmiṃ sutte tathāgatassa ñāṇabalaṃ kathitanti.
[06] mahāvaggo chaṭṭho.

[03] 65-67^b^.^eb^ sattamassa paṭhame ^b^assaddhiya^eb^nti assaddhabhāvaṃ. ^b^duppaññata^eb^nti nippaññabhāvaṃ. dutiye ^b^pamāda^eb^nti sativippavāsaṃ. tatiye ^b^ābhisamācārika^eb^nti uttamasamācārabhūtaṃ vattavasena paṇṇattisīlaṃ. ^b^sekhadhamma^eb^nti sekhapaṇṇattisīlaṃ. ^b^sīlānī^eb^ti cattāri mahāsīlāni.

[03] 68^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^V3.0139^ea^ ^b^saṅgaṇikārāmo^eb^ti gaṇasaṅgaṇikārāmo. suttantikagaṇādīsu pana gaṇesu attano vā parisāsaṅkhāte gaṇe ramatīti ^b^gaṇārāmo. paviveke^eb^ti kāyaviveke. ^b^cittassa nimitta^eb^nti samādhivipassanācittassa nimittaṃ samādhivipassanākāraṃ. ^b^sammādiṭṭhi^eb^nti vipassanāsammādiṭṭhiṃ. ^b^samādhi^eb^nti maggasamādhiñceva phalasamādhiñca. ^b^saṃyojanānī^eb^ti dasa saṃyojanāni. ^b^nibbāna^eb^nti apaccayaparinibbānaṃ.
[03] 69^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^sovacassatā^eb^ti subbacabhāvo. ^b^kalyāṇamittatā^eb^ti sucimittatā. ^b^satthugāravo^eb^ti satthari gāravayutto. esa nayo sabbattha.

[03] 70^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^M3.0138^ea^ ^a^P3.0411^ea^ ^b^na santenā^eb^ti paccanīkakilesehi avūpasantena. ^b^na paṇītenā^eb^ti na atappakena. ^b^na paṭippassaddhiladdhenā^eb^ti kilesappaṭippassaddhiyā aladdhena appattena. ^b^na ekodibhāvādhigatenā^eb^ti na ekaggabhāvaṃ upagatena.

[03] 71^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^tatra tatrā^eb^ti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ visese. ^b^sakkhibhabbata^eb^nti paccakkhabhāvaṃ. ^b^āyatane^eb^ti kāraṇe. ^b^hānabhāgiyā^eb^dayo visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 1.39) saṃvaṇṇitā. ^b^asakkaccakārī^eb^ti na sukatakārī, na ādarakārī. ^b^asappāyakārī^eb^ti na sappāyakārī, na upakārabhūtadhammakārī.
[03] 72^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^V3.0140^ea^ ^b^balata^eb^nti balabhāvaṃ thāmabhāvaṃ. ^b^asātaccakārī^eb^ti na satatakārī. sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
[03] 73-74^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^na yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭho hotī^eb^ti vatthukāmakilesakāmesu ādīnavo na yathāsabhāvato jhānapaññāya sudiṭṭho hoti. dasamaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
[06] devatāvaggo sattamo.
[03] 75^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhamassa paṭhame ^b^savighāta^eb^nti saupaghātaṃ sopaddavaṃ. ^b^sapariḷāha^eb^nti kāyikacetasikena pariḷāhena sapariḷāhaṃ. ^b^pāṭikaṅkhā^eb^ti icchitabbā avassaṃbhāvinī.

[03] 76^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^M3.0139^ea^ ^a^P3.0412^ea^ ^b^māna^eb^nti jātiādīhi maññanaṃ. ^b^omāna^eb^nti hīnohamasmīti mānaṃ. ^b^atimāna^eb^nti atikkamitvā pavattaṃ accuṇṇatimānaṃ. ^b^adhimāna^eb^nti adhigatamānaṃ. ^b^thambha^eb^nti kodhamānehi thaddhabhāvaṃ. ^b^atinipāta^eb^nti hīnassa hīnohamasmīti mānaṃ.

[03] 77^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^V3.0141^ea^ ^b^uttarimanussadhammā^eb^ti manussadhammato uttari. ^b^alamariyañāṇadassanavisesa^eb^nti ariyabhāvaṃ kātuṃ samatthaṃ ñāṇadassanavisesaṃ, cattāro magge cattāri ca phalānīti attho. ^b^kuhana^eb^nti tividhaṃ kuhanavatthuṃ. ^b^lapana^eb^nti lābhatthikatāya ukkhipitvā avakkhipitvā vā lapanaṃ.

[03] 78^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^yoni cassa āraddhā hotī^eb^ti kāraṇañcassa paripuṇṇaṃ paggahitaṃ hoti. ^b^dhammārāmo^eb^ti dhamme ratiṃ vindati. bhāvanāya ramati, bhāvento vā ramatīti ^b^bhāvanārāmo^eb^. pahāne ramati, pajahanto vā ramatīti ^b^pahānārāmo^eb^. tividhe paviveke ramatīti ^b^pavivekārāmo^eb^. abyāpajjhe niddukkhabhāve ramatīti ^b^abyāpajjhārāmo^eb^. nippapañcasaṅkhāte nibbāne ramatīti ^b^nippapañcārāmo^eb^.
[03] 79^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^na āyakusalo^eb^ti na āgamanakusalo. ^b^na apāyakusalo^eb^ti na apagamanakusalo. ^b^chanda^eb^nti kattukamyatāchandaṃ. ^b^na ārakkhatī^eb^ti na rakkhati.

[03] 80^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^ālokabahulo^eb^ti ñāṇālokabahulo. ^b^yogabahulo^eb^ti yoge bahulaṃ karoti. ^b^vedabahulo^eb^ti pītipāmojjabahulo. ^b^asantuṭṭhibahulo^eb^ti ^a^P3.0413^ea^ kusaladhammesu asantuṭṭho. ^b^anikkhittadhuro^eb^ti aṭṭhapitadhuro paggahitavīriyo. ^b^uttari ca patāretī^eb^ti sampati ca uttariñca vīriyaṃ karoteva. sattamaṃ uttānameva.

[03] 82-84^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^M3.0140^ea^ ^a^V3.0142^ea^ ^b^pagabbho^eb^ti kāyapāgabbhiyādīhi samannāgato. navamaṃ uttānatthameva. dasame ^b^vighātavā^eb^ti mahicchataṃ nissāya uppannena lobhadukkhena dukkhito. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
[06] arahattavaggo aṭṭhamo.

[03] 85^b^.^eb^ navamassa paṭhame ^b^sītibhāva^eb^nti sītalabhāvaṃ. ^b^yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ niggaṇhitabba^eb^ntiādīsu uddhaccasamaye cittaṃ samādhinā niggahetabbaṃ nāma, kosajjānupatitakāle vīriyena paggahetabbaṃ nāma, nirassādagatakāle samādhinā sampahaṃsitabbaṃ nāma, samappavattakāle bojjhaṅgupekkhāya ajjhupekkhitabbaṃ nāma.

[03] 86^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^kammāvaraṇatāyā^eb^ti pañcānantariyakammehi. ^b^kilesāvaraṇatāyā^eb^ti niyatamicchādiṭṭhiyā. ^b^vipākāvaraṇatāyā^eb^ti akusalavipākapaṭisandhiyā vā kusalavipākehi ahetukapaṭisandhiyā vāti.

[03] 88-89^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^V3.0143^ea^ ^b^anattha^eb^nti avaḍḍhiṃ. ^b^atthaṃ riñcatī^eb^ti vaḍḍhiatthaṃ chaḍḍeti. ^b^ananulomikāyā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0414^ea^ sāsanassa ananulomikāya. pañcame ^b^diṭṭhisampada^eb^nti sotāpattimaggaṃ.

[03] 92-95^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^anāgamanīyaṃ vatthu^eb^nti anupagantabbaṃ kāraṇaṃ, pañcannaṃ verānaṃ dvāsaṭṭhiyā ca diṭṭhigatānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^aṭṭhamaṃ bhava^eb^nti kāmāvacare aṭṭhamaṃ paṭisandhiṃ. navame ^b^kotūhalamaṅgalenā^eb^ti diṭṭhasutamutamaṅgalena ^a^M3.0141^ea^. dasame ^b^sayaṃkata^eb^ntiādīni attadiṭṭhivasena vuttāni. ^b^adhiccasamuppanna^eb^nti ahetunibbattaṃ. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
[06] sītivaggo navamo.

[03] 96-97^b^.^eb^ dasamassa paṭhame ^b^ariyāyatane^eb^ti majjhimadese. ^b^indriyāna^eb^nti manacchaṭṭhānaṃ. dutiye ^b^saddhammaniyato^eb^ti sāsanasaddhamme niyato. ^b^asādhāraṇenā^eb^ti puthujjanehi asādhāraṇena.

[03] 102^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^anodhiṃ karitvā^eb^ti ``ettakāva saṅkhārā aniccā, na ito pare''ti evaṃ sīmaṃ mariyādaṃ akatvā. ^b^anavatthitā^eb^ti avatthitāya rahitā, bhijjamānāva hutvā upaṭṭhahissantīti ^a^V3.0144^ea^ attho. ^b^sabbaloke^eb^ti sakale tedhātuke. ^b^sāmaññenā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0415^ea^ samaṇabhāvena, ariyamaggenāti attho.
[03] 103^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^mettāvatāyā^eb^ti mettāyuttāya pāricariyāya. satta hi sekhā tathāgataṃ mettāvatāya paricaranti, khīṇāsavo pariciṇṇasatthuko.
[03] 104^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^atammayo^eb^ti tammayā vuccanti taṇhādiṭṭhiyo, tāhi rahito. ^b^ahaṃkārā^eb^ti ahaṃkāradiṭṭhi. ^b^mamaṃkārā^eb^ti mamaṃkārataṇhā. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
[06] ānisaṃsavaggo dasamo.
[06] dutiyapaṇṇāsakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
[03] 107^b^.^eb^ ekādasamassa ^a^M3.0142^ea^ paṭhame ^b^asubhā^eb^ti asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^mettā^eb^ti mettākammaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^paññā^eb^ti sahavipassanā maggapaññā.
